original_en: Unlocks material for Advanced Cooking Formulas (sold at Shop Counter).
context: 解锁高级烹饪配方的消耗材料（商铺的柜台出售）

original_en: Material for crafting Advanced Contraptions (sold at Shop Counter).
context: 制作高级机关的消耗材料（商铺的柜台出售）

original_en: Unlocks material for forging Legendary Weapons and Concealed Weapons (sold at Shop Counter).
context: 解锁可锻造传说兵器、暗器的消耗材料（商铺的柜台出售）

original_en: Unlocks material for weaving Legendary Clothes (sold at Shop Counter).
context: 解锁可织造传说服装的消耗材料（商铺的柜台出售）

original_en: Material for making Advanced Potions (sold at Shop Counter).
context: 制作高级丹药的消耗材料（商铺的柜台出售）

original_en: A recipe for 「Unfulfilled Destiny」 and 「Dragon Snake Casserole」
context: 一本记录了「仙佛茫茫两未成」「龙蛇五珍烩」的菜谱

original_en: 「Tune Gong」 flows gracefully, gentle as Earth, mother of all beings. Restores listeners' mood and greatly increases Admire.
context: 「宫调」乐曲典雅、柔和而流畅，如大地涵育万物。聆听者恢复心情，欣赏态度大增

original_en: 「Tune Shang」 carries a hint of sorrow, though not strained. Listeners feel a touch of Sympathy.
context: 「商调」略带一丝悲伤的气息但却不僵硬。聆听者生出怜悯之心

original_en: 「Tune Jue」 depicts a vibrant world brimming with life. Restores listeners' Vigor and cures Ailments.
context: 「角调」天地一片欣欣向荣，所见之处皆充满生机。聆听者恢复气血，治疗隐疾

original_en: 「Tune Zhi」 is upbeat and lively, but not overly charged. Listeners' Technique and Move EXP increase over time.
context: 「徵调」乐曲的气氛欢快活络而不过份激昂。聆听者武技和招式的经验持续增加

original_en: 「Tune Yu」 lulls listeners into dreams with its soothing melody.
context: 「羽调」柔和温婉的音乐，聆听者昏昏然进入梦境

original_en: 「Placeable」 Have a bath to restore Vigor/Energy and cure Ailments. People can pay for relaxation or healing.
context: 「可放置」可以泡澡，恢复气血内力以及治疗隐疾，有人需求娱乐或治疗时会来消费

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to forge Weapons and Concealed Weapons. Higher Forging gives a higher chance of producing high-quality arms, at the cost of more resources consumed.
context: 「可放置」可以锻造兵器和暗器，锻造能力越高产出的高品质兵器概率越高，但是消耗的资源也会增加

original_en: 「Placeable」 Give donations to lessen Misfortune. People can pay to reduce Misfortune.
context: 「可放置」可以投放香火钱，减少厄运，有人需求减少厄运时会来消费
「可放置」竹席睡觉可以恢复气血

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to cook. Higher Cooking allows you to prepare higher-quality food. You can also apply statuses to bonfires to meet the requisites of advanced recipes.
context: 「可放置」可以进行烹饪，烹饪能力越高可以烧制更高品质的食物，还可以对火堆施加状态以满足高级食谱的需求

original_en: 「Placeable」 Helps you train Techniques and Kungfu Insights
context: 「可放置」木人可以训练武技和武学心得

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to make potions. Higher Leechcraft allows you to concoct more advanced potions.
context: 「可放置」可以炼制丹药，医术能力越高可以炼制更高级的丹药

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to sell Weapons/Concealed Weapons. People can buy powerful gear here.
context: 「可放置」可以贩卖兵器和暗器，有人需求装备强度时会来购买

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to sell food and drinks. People can buy refreshments here.
context: 「可放置」可以贩卖酒水和食物，有人需求酒水和食物时会来购买

original_en: 「Placeable」 A simple wooden table for four. People can pay to relax here.
context: 「可放置」容纳四人的简易木桌，有人需求娱乐时会来消费

original_en: 「Placeable」 A lavish wine table for two. People can pay to relax here.
context: 「可放置」容纳双人的豪华酒桌，有人需求娱乐时会来消费
「可放置」木床睡觉可以恢复气血

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to hide and gather water
context: 「可放置」水井可以躲避和打水

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to sell potions. People can buy potions they need.
context: 「可放置」可以贩卖丹药，有人需求丹药时会来购买

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to wait for healing. People can pay to use it.
context: 「可放置」可以等待治疗，有人需求治疗时会来消费

original_en: 「Placeable」 Stores curios. People can buy treasure here.
context: 「可放置」存放珍品的容器，有人需求珍品会来购买

original_en: 「Placeable」 Stores materials and goods. People can buy materials here.
context: 「可放置」可以存放货物和材料，有人需求材料时会来购买

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to sell hats, tops, and pants. People can buy powerful gear here.
context: 「可放置」可以贩卖帽子、衣服和裤子，有人需求装备强度时会来购买

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to pray. You earn money when someone prays here.
context: 「可放置」可以进行祈求，有人祈求就会获得收益

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to weave hats, tops, and pants. Higher Weaving gives a higher chance of producing high-quality outfits, at the cost of more resources consumed.
context: 「可放置」可以织造帽子、衣服、裤子等服装，织造能力越高产出的高品质服装概率越高，但是消耗的资源也会增加

original_en: 「Placeable」A place to sell horses and travel afar
context: 「可放置」可以贩卖马匹和远程移动

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to plant herbs. Use poo as a fertilizer to speed up growth.
context: 「可放置」可以种植各种草药，种植后可以消耗粑粑施肥，加快成熟效率
「可放置」公告板可以发布委托

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to keep Skill Manuals and Inner Kungfu Manuals. People can buy manuals to enhance themselves.
context: 「可放置」可以录入绝学书、内功书，有人需求成长时会来购买

original_en: 「Placeable」 Fends off invaders. Allows targeting of attackers.
context: 「可放置」可以防御入侵者，允许筛选攻击目标

original_en: 「Placeable」 A place to sell contraptions. People can buy devices here.
context: 「可放置」可以贩卖各种机关，有人需求机关设施时会来购买

original_en: 「Placeable」 Symbol of the sect. Only one is allowed in each region. If sect flags are removed from the world, the sect is destroyed.
context: 「可放置」门派的标志，每个区域只能存在一个，当世界中没有本门派的大旗时，门派将覆灭。
「可放置」简易的防御性建筑设施
「可放置」简易的防御性建筑设施

original_en: 「Placeable」 A facility to raise animals in
context: 「可放置」可以圈养动物的设施

original_en: 「Can be placed」The chair often sitting in Da Nei Guard
context: 「可放置」大内禁卫常坐的椅子

original_en: Restarting Karma will abandon the current character. Restart?  !
context: 重启天命会放弃当前角色，是否重启？！

original_en: You’ve survived {0} days in this world.
context: 你在这个世界生存了{0}天

original_en: Restricted by other when born with a treasure map
context: 出生受人控制，身藏一张藏宝图

original_en: Born with an arch enemy 「unknown」 and a random long lost Skill manual.
context: 出生拥有一个大仇人「未知」随机获得一本失传绝学。

original_en: Born blind but with better hearing. (Increased Sneak Sensation and Concealed Weapon DMG)
context: 天生双目失明，但耳力增强。（潜行感知范围增加，暗器伤害增加）

original_en: Born without a leg but with a strong resolution. (+50% Acquire SPD)
context: 天生腿脚残缺，但意志坚定。（+50%领悟速度）

original_en: Born unsociable. Unable to build positive relations with people. But you have an innate Skill 「Extermination」
context: 天生性格孤僻无法与人建立正面关系，本命绝学 「灭·绝」

original_en: Easier to be liked by the opposite sex but be hated by the same sex
context: 更容易获得异性好感，但容易遭同性排斥。

original_en: Born so beautiful that people would barely have a negative attitude toward you
context: 天生容貌过人，任何人都不会轻易产生负面态度。

original_en: Born so different that people would discriminate you. But also born with a long lost Inner Kungfu
context: 天生相貌奇特，容易遭受鄙视，但天生携带一种失传内功

original_en: Able to acquire Skills without a hitch
context: 领悟绝学秘籍毫无障碍

original_en: Born literate in beast tongues. You can tame multiple animals of the same kind.
context: 天生通晓兽语，同类动物可驯化多只
学习能力极慢，但基础招式数量+1

original_en: Moves have 30% chance to inflict Cold. Decrease Max 「Cold」 stacks by 10.
context: 招式30%概率附带寒冷，降低 10 「寒冷」最高层数

original_en: Moves have 30% chance to inflict Heat. Decrease Max 「Heat」 stacks by 10.
context: 招式30%概率附带灼热，降低 10 「灼热」最高层数

original_en: Moves have 30% chance to inflict Poison Gas. Decrease Max 「Poison Gas」 stacks by 10.
context: 招式30%概率附带毒瘴，降低 10 「毒瘴」最高层数

original_en: Able to acquire Skills from the those who lose control ability
context: 可从失去控制能力的人身上领悟到他的绝学

original_en: Born eloquent. Your goods value will rise in exchange.
context: 天生口才出众，交易时自身物品价值提升

original_en: Kindness comes with a lucky star.
context: 一念善心起，吉星随命来。

original_en: The good or the evil. You’ll pay for what you did.
context: 善恶终有报，天道好轮回。

original_en: Born into nobility, you are the heir of a renowned martial arts lineage. When you reincarnate, you can choose the leaders of a secluded family or a prestigious sect as your parents.
context: 出身高贵，是武林世家，名门之后。转世时可以选择隐世家族或名门大派的掌门作为父母。

original_en: Free yourself from worldly desires. Purge Five Banes and Three Demons.
context: 劈开尘心抛业网,驱除五漏斩三尸

original_en: You will have an enemy when you return to Karma.
context: 魂归天命时拥有结怨的人
累计 15 个情投意合的人

original_en: Survive 3 days without joining a sect
context: 不加入门派存活 3 日

original_en: Inflicted with 1,000 stacks of Cold in total
context: 累计触发过 1000 层寒冷

original_en: Inflicted with 1,000 stacks of Heat in total
context: 累计触发过 1000 层灼热

original_en: Inflicted with 49 stacks of Poison Gas in total
context: 累计触发过 49 层毒瘴
交易累计赚取 50000 利润

original_en: Help others 10 times in the past life
context: 上一世帮助他人 10 次

original_en: Become Close Friends or Intimate with 2 sect Masters.
context: 与累计 2 个掌门达成至交好友或情投意合的关系。

original_en: Demons disturbed, Five Banes arise. Trapped in karma, cursed by fate.
context: 尸虫惊邪凿五漏，身陷囹圄业缠身。

original_en: Deceived in your youth, you spent fearful years in a dark, gloomy mine. Only with the help of a valiant hero were you able to escape.
context: 年少时因被人诱骗，在暗无天日的矿洞惶惶度日。后得大侠相助才逃出生天。

original_en: Face aglow, like a radiant sun; cries resonant, like thundering drums.
context: 红光满面犹如煌煌大日，哭声洪亮宛如雷声震鼓。

original_en: Humpy temples. The belly rumbles like thunders.
context: 太阳穴高高隆起，小腹隐隐传出震雷之声。

original_en: In a dream, you are struck by vendettas from a past life. Upon waking, you recall the events of the dream, only to discover a cryptic script, granting you insight into a Skill long lost.
context: 睡梦中，你恍然忆起前世之仇。梦醒再忆梦中之事，却发现一切变为一篇玄之又玄的文字，助你悟得一项江湖失传已久的绝学。

original_en: You lost your sight after being hit in the eye by a slingshot when playing with friends. Yet you awakened an unexpected talent, granting you exceptional hearing.
context: 与同伴玩耍时被弹弓击中眼睛失明，却意外觉醒出天赋，耳力强大不逊常人。

original_en: You fell off a cliff and crippled your legs. Then you ate a strange wild fruit, which enlightened your mind, and gave you exceptional insight.
context: 不慎落崖致腿脚残缺。又误食无名野果，却从此一窍通，百窍通。拥有了非凡悟性。

original_en: Born under a comet, you were called a bringer of ill fate. When your parents died early, you fled into the mountains to escape your bullies, only to chance upon the halls of immortals and acquire your innate Skill 「Extermination」.
context: 天伴孛星被认为是不详之人，又因父母早亡饱受欺凌，一怒之下遁入深山，却误打误撞闯入仙人洞府，悟得本命绝学「灭·绝」

original_en: Born with effortless charms, you invite both the admiration of suitors and the ire of the same sex.
context: 天生桃花之体，虽容易吸引异性青睐，却也会招来同性仇视的目光。

original_en: You were too beautiful. Everyone liked you since you were a child. Born with an ethereal grace, you were cherished by everyone since childhood, and blossomed into a divine beauty.
context: 因容貌过人，自幼都招人喜爱。,生有出尘脱俗之貌，从小便是邻里街坊的心头宝，成年之后更是宛如天人之姿。

original_en: Your peculiar looks drew much scorn, until a nomad sage saw your potential and taught you his secret Inner Kungfu. When you rise to fame, don't forget your mentor.
context: 相貌异于常人而备受嫌弃，后有游方老道见过你后惊为天人，遂将独门内功教导与你，望你日后成就伟业时能够记得他。

original_en: Your talent continued to grow. There was no bottleneck for you in learning martial arts.
context: 渐渐展露出聪颖的天资，武学障碍对你来说毫无制约。

original_en: A big ape carried you away into the mountains and woods. After a few years,you were found by a stream and brought back. Since then you became well versed in animal’s language and thus close to animals.
context: 一只大猿将你夺走，逃入深山密林之中。数年后在溪边被人救回，从此通晓兽语，喜与百兽亲近。

original_en: Born dull-witted, your sluggish learning often drew disdain. But when you turn to kungfu, you can seize the lead despite a late start and take on challenges with ease.
context: 天生愚笨，学习极其缓慢而常被他人嫌弃，后弃文习武，却发现在实战中又能后发先至，游刃有余。

original_en: In a cold snowy season,you looked heathy,radiant,and refreshed.
context: 天降大雪，寒气袭人，但你却面色红润，神清气爽。

original_en: In a burning hot season,you felt comfortable and refreshed.
context: 正值三伏，烈日炎炎，骄阳似火，但你却倍感舒畅。

original_en: Born with a faded, purple serpent birthmark on your face that grew more distinct with each passing year.
context: 出生时面部隐隐浮现青紫色蛇形胎记，随年岁增加而日渐明晰。

original_en: A photographic memory lets you acquire your opponents' Kungfu Skills simply by crossing fists.
context: 拥有过目不忘之能，能通过交手就习得对方武功绝学。
已展露出出众的口才，能言善辩、舌灿莲花。

original_en: The Heaven brought down a good omen. A lucky star shines up high.
The Heaven brought down an ominous star. Misfortune follows you.
Born sweeter than blossoms, radiant in sunlight gold. Joy fills all days, wealth and prosperity flow.
context: 生来即胜白花芳，日洒金光满院香。快意时时前后伴，乐融富贵进门窗。

original_en: Take what he gave and let him go
Warrior,these are all yours. Please let me go...
context: 大侠，这些东西都给你，求你放我一马...

original_en: Warrior,I’ll tell you a <TipKey>secret message</>. Please let me go...\\n<MsgSectStyle>「Click Me - Message to view」</>
context: 大侠,给你一个<TipKey>秘密消息</>，求你放过我......\\n<MsgSectStyle>「点击自身-消息,即可查看」</>

original_en: You really think these could save your life? These are not enough!
context: 这就想让我放过你？你给的还不够啊

original_en: Please let me go. I accept your punishment.
You’re so kind! Please take it.
context: 您真的太仁慈了，拿取吧。

original_en: You ask for too much! I refuse! !!
context: 你要的太多了！！我绝不答应！！！
仔细翻遍其全身后获得

original_en: Change Key Bindings:{0} \\n conflicts with {1}. Change?
context: 更改键位·{0} \\n 与{1}冲突，是否确认更改

original_en: Release the unique learning background mode

context: 交换通用确认返回按键
正在验证数据完整性，完成最后加载...

original_en: <TipWhite>Chi determines how much Energy you have. Use Qinggong or climb will consume Energy</>
context: <TipWhite>真气决定内力多少，使用轻功或攀爬会消耗内力</>

original_en: <TipWhite>DMG taken after Vigor is depleted will induce 「Inner Injury Ailment」 in meridians</>
context: <TipWhite>气血耗尽后受到伤害会在经脉中产生「内伤隐疾」</>
<TipWhite>心境低会在经脉中产生「癫狂隐疾」</>

original_en: <TipWhite>Ailments in meridians reduce Health. When Health is 0,you’ll return to Karma.</>
context: <TipWhite>经脉中的隐疾会减少生命力，生命力为 0 时将魂归天命</>

original_en: <TipWhite>After joining a sect, you can contribute to sect earnings every {0} days</>
context: <TipWhite>加入门派后每隔 {0} 日，可为门派增加铜钱收益</>

original_en: My name is {0}. {1} is my father,and {2} my mother.
You dug for treasure according to the clue on the treasure map. {0}
context: 我根据藏宝图的线索挖掘宝藏，{0}。

original_en: You fell from a high place and got 「Leg Disability」.
context: 我从高处跌落，落下「腿脚残缺」。
我剧毒隐疾伤势严重，导致「失明」。

original_en: You joined Kungfu Contest. After a brutal fight, {0}.
context: 我参加了武林大会，一番激战后，{0}。

original_en: My soul returns to destiny, died in the hand of {0}
Achieved <Red>[Purge Demons] </>[Top Demon (Sloth): Have {0} money] Purged one Demon
context: 达成<Red>【斩三尸】</>【上尸虫彭侯（嗜欲迟滞）：钱财达到{0}】 三尸去其一

original_en: Achieved <Red>[Purge Demons] </>[Mid Demon (Wrath): Have {0} Enmities] Purged one Demon
context: 达成<Red>【斩三尸】</>【中尸虫彭质（妄动干戈）：结怨达到{0}个】三尸去其一

original_en: Achieved <Red>[Purge Demons] </>[Bottom Demon (Lust): Have {0} Intimate relationships] Purged one Demon
context: 达成<Red>【斩三尸】</>【下尸虫彭娇（骄淫奢靡）：情投意合人数达到{0}个】三尸去其一

original_en: You have purged the Three Demons and shed your mortal form.
context: 你已斩去三尸，蜕去凡体。
当前生命力 {0} 最大生命力 {1}

original_en: Meridians (space) represent character’s max Health.\\nAilments will damage meridians and reduce Health.
context: 经脉系统中的经脉(空格)是角色的最大生命力\\n各种隐疾会损害经脉，降低生命力

original_en: Every Ailment will get worse by time,in various degrees.\\nWhen Health is 0,character will die.
context: 每种隐疾随着时间会不同程度的扩散加深\\n当生命力为 0 时，角色死亡

original_en: When cleansing Ailments, you need to connect Chi to all the same kind of Ailments. Ailments will be cleansed after a moment.\\nEach Ailment costs different Chi.\\nMore Chi speeds up curing.
context: 清除隐疾时需要将真气同时连接所有相同隐疾，等待片刻方可消除\\n每个隐疾需要消耗的真气不同\\n真气越多治疗速度越快
当前真气 <JmTipOrange>{0}</> 最大真气 <JmTipWhite>{1}</>

original_en: Click Inner Elixir Field to connect Meridians. Connecting (by 「Clicking」) to <JmTipWhite> 1 </> Slot will cost <JmTipWhite> 1 </> Chi.
context: 点击丹田开始连接经脉，每连接「点击」<JmTipWhite> 1 </> 格经脉需要消耗<JmTipWhite> 1 </>点真气。

original_en: Connect to each acupoint from the Inner Elixir Field,and connect them back to the Inner Elixir Field. Thus you create a routine for Chi to activate acupoint effects.
context: 从丹田连接各个穴位，再连回丹田，形成一条真气运行路线，则激活穴位效果

original_en: To activate Inner Kungfu skill,you need to let the Chi routine include required acupoint order.
context: 内功心法的激活，则需要真气运行路线中包含内功需要的穴位顺序。

original_en: You cured {0} of Ailments. Their Affinity toward you has increased. \\n{1}
context: 你治疗了{0}的隐疾，他对你的好感增加了。\\n{1}

original_en: <JmTipRed>「Inner Injury Ailment」</><JmTipWhite> Taking DMG after Vigor drops to 0 will lead to Inner Injury Ailment</>
context: <JmTipRed>「内伤隐疾」</><JmTipWhite> 气血为空后受到额外伤害会造成内伤隐疾</>

original_en: <JmTipRed>「Venom Ailment」</><JmTipWhite> If Poison Gas takes effect multiple times,it will lead to Venom Ailment,which spreads in the meridians every 60 seconds. Too many Venom Ailments will induce 「Blind」</>
context: <JmTipRed>「剧毒隐疾」</><JmTipWhite> 毒瘴发作多次会造成剧毒隐疾，每隔 60 秒会在经脉中扩散，过多时会导致「失明」</>

original_en: <JmTipRed>「Fire Ailment」</><JmTipWhite> Spreads in the meridians at noon every day. Fire Ailment can burn other Ailments.</>
context: <JmTipRed>「火毒隐疾」</><JmTipWhite> 每日正午会在经脉中扩散，火毒隐疾能烧毁其他隐疾</>

original_en: <JmTipRed>「Ice Ailment」</><JmTipWhite> If Cold takes effect 10 times,it will lead to Ice Ailment</>
context: <JmTipRed>「寒毒隐疾」</><JmTipWhite> 寒冷状态发作 10 次造成寒毒隐疾</>

original_en: <JmTipRed>「Hysteria」</><JmTipWhite> Low Spirits lead to Hysteria. Too much Hysteria may induce Deluded</>
context: <JmTipRed>「癫狂隐疾」</><JmTipWhite> 心境过低时会造成癫狂隐疾，过多时可能走火入魔</>

original_en: <JmTipRed>「Lampworm Ailment」</><JmTipWhite> Marks the parasitifer on the map. In most circumstances,it can only be cleansed by the caster.</>
context: <JmTipRed>「灯蛊」</><JmTipWhite> 大地图标记宿主，一般只能由蛊师解除</>

original_en: <JmTipRed>「Bloodworm Ailment」</><JmTipWhite> When it’s triggered,steal 1 Vigor for the caster. In most circumstances,it can only be cleansed by the caster.</>
context: <JmTipRed>「血蛊」</><JmTipWhite> 每次触发，为蛊师吸取 1 点气血，一般只能由蛊师解除</>

original_en: <JmTipRed>「Loveworm Ailment」</><JmTipWhite> Lures the parasitifer to have unconditional Intimacy with the caster. The parasitifer will be unable to have negative attitude toward the caster. In most circumstances,it can only be cleansed by the caster.</>
context: <JmTipRed>「情蛊」</><JmTipWhite> 对蛊师无条件情投意合，无法产生负面态度，一般只能由蛊师解除</>

original_en: <JmTipRed>「Retaliation」</><JmTipWhite> Inflicted with Retaliation after breaking through the limit of Kungfu Skills. Unable to be cleansed</>
context: <JmTipRed>「反噬」</><JmTipWhite> 突破武功绝学的极限，遭受反噬，无法解除</>

original_en: <JmTipRed>「Blind」</><JmTipWhite> Ailment of the eyes. Only hearing can be used. Unable to use Concealed Weapon Moves. Can be cured at the Clinic</>
context: <JmTipRed>「失明」</><JmTipWhite> 眼部患疾，只能听声辨位，无法使用暗器招式，可前往医馆治疗</>

original_en: <JmTipRed>「Ordeal Sigil」</><JmTipWhite> It takes effect at midnight and noon everyday,randomly creating 3 Hysteria which can’t be cleansed in general situations.</>
context: <JmTipRed>「噬心蚀骨符」</><JmTipWhite> 每日子、午时发作，随机产生 3 个癫狂隐疾，一般无法解除</>

original_en: <JmTipRed>「Hand Disability」</><JmTipWhite>Unable to use Palm and Fist Moves. Can be cleansed at Clinic</>
context: <JmTipRed>「手残」</><JmTipWhite> 手部患疾，无法使用掌法、拳法招式，可前往医馆解除</>

original_en: <JmTipRed>「Leg Disability」</><JmTipWhite> Ailment of the legs. Significantly reduces MSPD. Unable to use Kick Moves. Can be cured at the Clinic</>
context: <JmTipRed>「腿残」</><JmTipWhite> 腿部患疾，移动速度大幅降低，无法使用腿法招式，可前往医馆治疗</>

original_en: Rebuild resets the building to Foundation and refunds {0}. Proceed?
context: 重建会将建筑重置为地基状态，返还：{0}，是否继续！

original_en: After dismantling, items in the carriage are returned to your Backpack. Proceed?
context: 马车拆除后车内物品将回到背包，是否继续？
是否覆盖当前所选蓝图存档？

original_en: Resetting the Miniworld will clear all its data, keeping only Karma, Lineage, Cultivator, Trial Progress and Fortune Jades! ! ! Proceed? \\n(To delete a character, start the game with the character and select Returned to Karma in the System Menu. )
context: 重置小世界会清除该世界所有数据，只保留天命、血脉、耕父、历练进度及福玉！！！是否继续重置？\\n（如需删除角色，请使用该角色进入游戏，在系统菜单中使用魂归天命选项。）

original_en: By Return to Karma,you abandon the current character and pass on Kungfu and Lineage. Proceed?
context: 魂归天命将放弃当前角色，并进行功法与血脉传承，是否继续？

original_en: <MgRed>By restarting Miniworld,all content will be cleared! !! Proceed? </>
context: <MgRed>重启小世界会将清除所有内容！！！是否继续？</>

original_en: Deleting data will clear all data and reset the game to its initial state! ! ! Proceed?
context: 删除数据后所有数据将全部清空，恢复到游戏初始状态！！！是否继续？

original_en: If you take this person's head, there could be a grave consequence!
context: 拿取此人首级，后果可能会很严重！

original_en: If you are caught stealing, there might be a grave consequence. Please think twice before you do so...
context: 如果尝试偷窃，被人发现，后果可能会很严重，请三思……

original_en: If you are caught picking a lock,there might be a grave consequence. Please think twice before you do so...
context: 如果尝试开锁，被人发现，后果可能会很严重，请三思……

original_en: Marking enemy will cause changes in the relations. Mark?
context: 标记仇人会导致关系产生变化，是否强制标记？

original_en: Move to {0} at the Stable soon. It will cost {1}. Move to zone {2}
context: 即将移动到{0}马厩处，需要花费{1} 钱，移动至{2}区域
是否与其共同游玩一番？

original_en: Thank you for helping me build this. If you need anything, I'm here to help.
context: 感谢大侠您帮我完成建筑！今后有事尽管找我，我定当两肋插刀！

original_en: Betray your sect and join theirs? You’ll pay the price for betraying your sect. Please think twice...
context: 是否要判出你的师门，加入对方的门派？判出师门将付出代价，请三思……

original_en: No {0} resources in current Miniworld. Develop more Land Masses!
context: 当前小世界缺少{0}的资源产出，请开辟更多地块！

original_en: The other party profits more in this Exchange. Proceed?
context: 本次交易对方获利更多，是否继续？

original_en: The other party profits more in this Exchange. Give them the item for free?
context: 本次交易对方获利更多，是否将物品无偿赠与对方？

original_en: They offer {0} coins for your {1}. Agree to sell?
context: 对方愿意出{0}铜钱购买你的{1}，是否同意出售？

original_en: This feature is temporarily added to resolve potential issues that may arise in the game. If you're not stuck, we recommend not using this function, as it may cause you to miss many interesting scenarios. Continue with the teleport?
context: 此功能为游戏可能会出现的问题临时增加，如果此时您没有卡死，建议您不要使用此功能，否则可能会跳过很多有趣的设定，是否继续传送？

original_en: You have broken Sect rules and punishment is imminent!
context: 你已触犯了本派门规，将受到来自门派的惩罚！

original_en: As the Sect Master, you willingly broke sect rules. Though your disciples don't say anything, deep down they hold you in despise.
context: 你贵为一派之主，却主动触犯门规，门派众弟子嘴上虽不说，但心中均对你表达鄙视！

original_en: Your sect's {0} has generated work revenue: {1}\\nStored in Warehouse\\n
context: 您的门派的{0}产生了工作收益：{1}\\n已存放在库房中\\n
{0}与你的{1}发生了交易：\\n获得：{2}\\n售出：{3}

original_en: Your sect has generated tax revenue: {0}\\nStored in Warehouse\\n
context: 您的门派产生了税收收益：{0}\\n已存放在库房中\\n

original_en: Your wanted level to increase to {0} level
context: 你的通缉等级提升到 {0} 级

original_en: Black sparrow comes, black sparrow leaves, the sound of black sparrow urges the owl head! Old lord dies, new lord lives!\\nAlthough you have become the new lord of the mansion, one day you will also face challenges from us Black Sparrows！
context: 黑雀来，黑雀走，黑雀声声催枭首！旧君死，新君生！\\n虽然你成为了新的府君，但总有一天你也会面对来自我们黑雀众的挑战！

original_en: Black sparrow comes, black sparrow leaves, the sound of black sparrow urges the owl head! Old lord dies, new lord lives!\\nThe new lord has already appeared！
context: 黑雀来，黑雀走，黑雀声声催枭首！旧君死，新君生！\\n新府君已经出现了！

original_en: Start:\\nBlack bird's stepping night curtain will lead the lonely soul to the other side. Silently, no longer get up. It is like ghosts, leaving such as flowing water.\\nAfter the end of the matter, Xinyi is approaching, please wait for the good voice.\\n\\nEight -sided black bird
context: 启：\\n黑雀踏夜幔，将引孤魂越彼岸。默然无声，终不再起。行如鬼魅，留若流水。\\n待事成之后，信翼将至，请静候佳音。\\n\\n八面黑雀

original_en: Start:\\nThe black bird's wing, the falling wood was scattered, and the falling wood was silent. Zongmen is like a smoke, scattered in the wind without leaving marks.\\nWhen the dust is settled, the faith is approaching, please wait for the good sound.\\n\\nEight -sided black bird
context: 启：\\n黑雀合翼，落木散尽归于寂。宗门如烟，散于风中不留痕。\\n待尘埃落定，信翼将至，请静候佳音。\\n\\n八面黑雀
此项受天命和父母影响

original_en: Death is insufficient for the crime

context: 是否要脱离「{0}」门派，加入「{1}」门派

original_en: After the Master's demise, the person with the highest Prestige in the sect becomes the new Master.
context: 掌门死亡后，当前门派声望最高的人继任为新的掌门

original_en: Whenever the sect occupies a new lot, you can recruit 3 additional disciples.
context: 门派势力每扩充1个地块，可额外招募3名弟子

original_en: The number of occupied lots determines the number of disciples that can be recruited and the amount of tax collected from the lots.
context: 占领的地块数量，决定了可招募弟子数量和地块税收数量

original_en: The number of Sect Skills is determined by the number of Skills acquired by all past Masters.
context: 门派绝学数量由历任掌门掌握的绝学数量决定。

original_en: The number of Sect Inner Kungfu is determined by the number of Inner Kungfu acquired by all past Masters.
context: 门派内功数量由历任掌门掌握的内功数量决定。

original_en: Warehouse Finance is determined by the total amount of coins in all containers in the Warehouse.
context: 门派资金由库房里所有容器中的铜钱总计决定。

original_en: Buildings Owned are all those that belong to the sect. The Master has the authority to use these buildings.
context: 拥有建筑是所有归属于门派的建筑掌门拥有使用这些建筑的权限。

original_en: Expected Revenue is the sum of all disciple contributions and lot taxes, minus the salary of all disciples.
context: 预计收益为所有弟子的门派贡献和地块税收减去所有弟子的月例。

original_en: Taxes (in coins) are collected from commoners living on lots. The more commoners there are, the higher the tax revenue.
context: 每个拥有平民人口的地块都会缴纳铜钱税金，平民数量越多税收越多。

original_en: On lots that yield {0}, commoners will produce the resource and deliver it to the sect.
context: 所有会产出{0}的地块，将由平民产出并交付门派。

original_en: You need to get a retainer or promotion to give orders.
context: 只有收服麾下或提升门派职位，才可以指派命令！

original_en: You need to join or create a sect to view the Sect Info.
context: 只有加入或创建门派，才能查看相应的门派信息！

original_en: 「You can gain Prestige by challenging members of higher rank or completing commissions from sect members. Once your Prestige reaches the requisite for the next level, you can ask the Master for a promotion.」\\n「You can only challenge each person once a day.」
context: 「挑战更高职务的人或完成门派中人的委托任务都可以增加门派声望，声望达到下一个职务需求时可以找掌门进行职务晋升评定」\\n「每天只能对相同的人挑战一次」

original_en: You can assign disciples to study your sect's school of Kungfu. Disciples will practice Skills first, followed by Inner Kungfu, and gradually upgrade their build.
context: 可以指定弟子修习门派的武学流派，弟子按照绝学和内功的顺序进行修炼，逐步替换自身的配置。

original_en: No available disciples in the sect. Recruit new members to strengthen your forces!
context: 门派没有可用弟子，招募一些弟子壮大门派吧！

original_en: The Master makes Sect Rules, and each position receives a salary from Warehouse Finance every 3 days.
context: 掌门制定门规，每个职务每隔3日从门派资金领取对应数额的月例。

original_en: Loyalty is determined by the person's Affinity to the Master. If Loyalty becomes too low, they may leave the sect.
context: 此人对掌门的好感度决定忠诚度，忠诚度过低有可能会脱离门派。

original_en: Determined by the person's competence. They'll contribute coins to Warehouse Finance every 3 days.
context: 由此人的实力决定，每隔3日将铜钱贡献到门派资金中。

original_en: The Master can assign disciples to practice the sect's school of Kungfu. Disciples will practice unmastered Skills and Inner Kungfu, and gradually upgrade their build.
context: 掌门可指定弟子修炼门派武学流派，弟子会按照顺序依次修炼还没有掌握的绝学和内功，修炼完成后会逐步替换自身的配置。

original_en: Challenging others in the sect or completing sect quests increases Sect Prestige. \\nHigher Prestige elevates your status in the sect.
context: 挑战门派中人或完成门派任务都会增加门派声望。\\n声望越高，在门派中的地位也会相应提高。

original_en: The Master can assign disciple jobs. Each job raises the level of the corresponding Ability. \\nDisciples with higher Ability levels work faster with better results.
context: 掌门可指定弟子工作，每种工作都会提高对应能力的等级。\\n对应能力等级越高，工作效率和成果越出色。

original_en: The Master can appoint disciples to Positions. Higher positions get higher salaries.
context: 掌门可指定弟子职位,职位越高月例相应也会越多。

original_en: {0} has challenged your sect to a duel. Accept?
context: {0}向我方门派发起约战，是否前往参与？
是否自动派遣人员前往战斗？

original_en: No combatants selected. Depart for battle alone?
context: 当前没有选中战斗人员，是否独自前往战斗？

original_en: You've left the duel lot. After some time...
context: 您已离开了约战地块，一段时间后

original_en: Death is insufficient for the crime

context: 门派月例发放了，你获得了{0}钱

original_en: Insufficient finance. Your Salary has been deducted.
context: 门派资金不足，你的月例被扣除了

original_en: Do you want to close the game? (Will lose the last saved progress to the present)
context: 是否关闭游戏？（会丢失上次保存到现在的进度）

original_en: You’ve survived {0} days in this world.
context: 你在这个世界生存了{0}天

context: 少侠可否为在下寻来几株兰玲草？在下可用同等价值的奖励交换。

original_en: I'm outta Iron Ore for my weapons. Reckon ya could fetch me some? I can trade ya somethin' of equal value.
context: 打造兵器的铁矿不够用了，若少侠能给俺寻来一些，俺可用同等价值的奖励交换。

original_en: I'm outta Refined Iron for my weapons. Reckon ya could fetch me some? I can trade ya somethin' of equal value.
context: 打造兵器的精铁不够用了，若少侠能给俺寻来一些，俺可用同等价值的奖励交换。

original_en: I'm outta Red Copper for my weapons. Reckon ya could fetch me some? I can trade ya somethin' of equal value.
context: 打造兵器的赤铜不够用了，若少侠能给俺寻来一些，俺可用同等价值的奖励交换。

original_en: I need some Ramie. If you could fetch me some, I can offer you something of equal value in return.
context: 我需要一些苎麻，少侠若能替我寻来，我可以用相同价值的物品交换。

original_en: Cough, cough. I'm down with a cold today. Do you think you could help me build a Residence? I'm happy to gift you something of equal value for your trouble.
context: 咳咳咳，我今日偶感风寒使不上力气，能否帮我建造一座民居？我可以将同等价值的物品赠予少侠。

original_en: Could you fetch some Marrow Refining Pills for me? I'm happy to offer something of equal value in return.
context: 少侠可否为在下寻来几颗洗髓丹？在下可用同等价值的奖励交换。

original_en: Could you fetch some Warm Jades for me? I'm happy to offer something of equal value in return.
context: 少侠可否为在下寻来几块暖玉？在下可用同等价值的奖励交换。

original_en: Could you fetch some Drunken Peach Blossoms for me? I'm happy to offer something of equal value in return.
context: 少侠可否为在下寻来几朵醉仙桃花？在下可用同等价值的奖励交换。

original_en: Could you fetch some Wine Jars for me? I'm happy to offer something of equal value in return.
context: 少侠可否为在下寻来几口酒坛？在下可用同等价值的奖励交换。

original_en: Could you fetch some Stone Chunks for me? I'm happy to offer something of equal value in return.
context: 少侠可否为在下寻来几块石块？在下可用同等价值的奖励交换。

original_en: Do you happen to carry a Horse Certificate? Would you be willing to trade that with me? I can offer you something of equal value in exchange.
context: 少侠可有马证？是否愿意转让与我，我可用同等价值的奖励交换。

original_en: I have nothing to offer you!
context: 但是我给不了你什么东西！

original_en: I only have these to offer.
context: 我能给你的就这些东西了

original_en: Is there anything you’re interested in? Take it in exchange.
context: 作为交换，看看有没有你中意的东西？

original_en: Take whatever you like. Please complete my Commission!
context: 看中什么尽管拿，请务必完成我的委托！

original_en: It’s beyond my cost! Go find somebody else!
context: 这亏本差事我可不干，请另寻高明吧！

original_en: Deals! I’m willing to accept the Commission.
context: 这份差事不亏，在下愿意接受委托！

original_en: [After dragging one type of Move and connecting an <TDName>「Omni Move」</> {0}, you can connect any other type of Move]\\n[Drag Move to <TDName>「Cast Zone」</> on the right to use]
context: 【拖动一类招式后连接<TDName>「挂招」</>{0}，可以连接另外一类招式】\\n【将招式拖动到右侧<TDName>「释放区域」</>释放】

original_en: [Same Moves can be dragged all at once]\\n[Deliver as many Moves as you can. If you have more Moves than your opponent, they can only take the hits]\\n[After dragging <TDName>4 of the same Move</> in one turn, draw 1 extra Move]\\n[Drag activated Skill to <TDName>[Cast Zone]</> on the right to cast]
context: 【相同的招式可以一次全部拖动】\\n【尽可能的打出最多的招式，招式数量超过对手他只能被动挨打】\\n【一回合中拖动<TDName> 4 个相同招式</>后，额外抽取 1 个招式】\\n【激活的绝学可以拖动到右侧<TDName>「释放区域」</>释放】

original_en: [After dragging one type of Move and connecting a <TDName>「Changeable Move」</> {0}, you can turn the next connected Move to that Changeable Move's type]
context: 【拖动一类招式后连接<TDName>「变招」</>{0}，可将之后连接的第一个招式变化为变招的招式类型】

original_en: [After dragging <TDName>3 different types of</> Moves in one turn, draw 1 extra Move]
context: 【一回合中拖动<TDName> 3 种不同类型</>的招式，额外抽取 1 个招式】

original_en: [After connecting a <TDName>「DEF Move」</> {0}, you can copy the next connected Move to next turn to have more Moves on field]
context: 【连接<TDName>「守招」</>{0}后，可将之后连接的第一个招式复制到下个回合，增加场上招式的数量】

original_en: [Draw Chi from <TDName>Inner Elixir Field</>, connect the required acupoints in the correct order, then connect back to <TDName>Inner Elixir Field</> to activate the Inner Kungfu]\\n[Every<TDName> 1 </>Slot connected by 「Clicking」 costs<TDName> 1 </>Chi]\\n[「Double Click」 Meridian to disconnect]
context: 【从<TDName>丹田</>引出真气，依次连接内功需要的穴位顺序，再连回<TDName>丹田</>后激活内功】\\n【每连接「点击」<TDName> 1 </>格经脉需要消耗<TDName> 1 </>点真气】\\n【「双击」经脉可以断开连接】

original_en: [The <TDName>「Slots」</> in Meridians represent a character's Max Health]\\n[Ailments damage meridians and reduce Health. When Health drops to 0, the character dies]\\n[To cleanse Ailments, connect Chi to all <TDName>「Ailments of the same kind」</> and they will be cleansed after a while]\\n[If you have too many Ailments, you can seek cure at Clinic or Spring]
context: 【经脉中<TDName>「格子」</>是角色的最大生命力】\\n【各种隐疾会损害经脉，降低生命力，当生命力为 0 时，角色死亡】\\n【清除隐疾时需要将真气同时连接所有<TDName>「同类隐疾」</>，等待片刻方可消除】\\n【隐疾过多时可以到医馆或温泉治疗】

original_en: [When dragging Moves, <TDName>[Move Counters]</> are displayed as they become available]\\n[If you Counter over half of your opponent's total Moves, you enter <TDName>[Counterattack Time]</>]\\n[After Counterattack, the opponent's subsequent Moves are discarded]\\n[Hover over the yellow dots in battle to see the Counter chart]
context: 【拖动招式出现克制时，会显示<TDName>「克制关系」</>】\\n【克制对手总招式数量一半以上时会进入<TDName>「破招时刻」</>】\\n【破招后，对手的后续招式将被废弃】\\n【战斗中鼠标悬浮屏幕上方黄点，会显示克制关系图】

original_en: [When <TDName>「Poison Gas」</> takes effect, the target takes DMG equal to the current number of stacks. Inflicts <TDName>「Venom Ailment」</> on meridians if triggered multiple times. Cure: Clinic, Spring, Anti-poison Plaster]
context: 【<TDName>「毒瘴」</>起效时，受到当前层数伤害，多次触发会在经脉产生<TDName>「剧毒隐疾」</>，治疗途径：医馆、温泉、祛毒膏】

original_en: [<TDName>「Cold」</> slows down Energy recovery and reduces the number of Moves per turn. 15 stacks of Cold may cause <TDName>「Frozen」</>. Cure: Clinic, Spring, Anti-poison Plaster, Heat]
context: 【<TDName>「寒冷」</>内力恢复速度缓慢，每回合招式数量减少，寒冷15层有可能<TDName>「冰冻」</>，治疗途径：医馆、温泉、祛毒膏、灼热】

original_en: [<TDName>「Heat」</> stacks over 15 inflict Burn. Inflicts Fire Ailment in Meridians if triggered multiple times. Cure: Water, rain, Spring, Clinic]
context: 【<TDName>「灼热」</> 超过15层会产生燃烧，触发多次会在经脉中产生火毒隐疾，治疗途径：水里、下雨、温泉、医馆】

original_en: [<TDName>「Dysentery」</> Oh crap, I've got the runs...Cure: Clinic, Spring, Anti-poison Plaster]
context: 【<TDName>「痢疾」</>时不时的就感觉马上要窜稀了.....，治疗途径：医馆、温泉、祛毒膏】

original_en: [<TDName>「Drunk」</> decreases MSPD. Each stack inflicts Flaw. Target <TDName>「Passes Out Drunk」</> with 15 stacks of Drunk. Cure: Clinic, Spring, Meditate]
context: 【<TDName>「醉意」</>减少移动速度，每层增加招式破绽，醉意15层时会<TDName>「醉倒」</>，治疗途径：医馆、温泉、打坐】

original_en: [<TDName>「Lockpicking」</> Traces of lockpicking invite <TDName>「Despise」</>. Stay out of sight until Lockpicking disappears]
context: 【<TDName>「开锁」</>开锁留下踪迹，容易遭人<TDName>「鄙视」</>，开锁消失前不要被人看到你】

original_en: [<TDName>「Stained」</> You reek of blood, inviting <TDName>「Dislike」</>. Stay out of sight until Stained disappears]
context: 【<TDName>「染血」</>沾染浓郁血气，容易遭人<TDName>「厌恶」</>，染血消失前不要被人看到你】

original_en: [<TDName>「Misdeed」</> Your sneaky deeds invite <TDName>「Despise」</>. Stay out of sight until Misdeed disappears]
context: 【<TDName>「恶行」</>鬼鬼祟祟，容易遭人<TDName>「鄙视」</>，恶行消失前不要被人看到你】

original_en: [<TDName>「Inner Injury Ailment」</> Taking DMG after Vigor drops to 0 will lead to Inner Injury Ailment. Cure: Clinic, Spring, Meridian Self-Healing]
context: 【<TDName>「内伤隐疾」</> 气血为空后受到额外伤害会造成内伤隐疾，治疗途径：医馆、温泉、经脉中自疗】

original_en: [<TDName>「Venom Ailment」</> If Poison Gas takes effect 10 times, it will lead to Venom Ailment, which spreads every 60 seconds. Cure: Clinic, Spring, Meridian Self-Healing]
context: 【<TDName>「剧毒隐疾」</>毒瘴状态发作 10 次造成剧毒隐疾，每隔 60 秒剧毒隐疾会扩散，治疗途径：医馆、温泉、经脉中自疗】

original_en: [<TDName>「Fire Ailment」</> If Heat takes effect 10 times, it will lead to Fire Ailment, which spreads at noon every day. Fire Ailment can burn other Ailments. Cure: Clinic, Spring, Meridian Self-Healing]
context: 【<TDName>「火毒隐疾」</>灼热状态发作 10 次造成火毒隐疾，每日正午扩散，火毒隐疾会烧毁其他隐疾，治疗途径：医馆、温泉、经脉中自疗】

original_en: [<TDName>「Ice Ailment」</> If Cold takes effect 10 times, it will lead to Ice Ailment. Cure: Clinic, Spring, Meridian Self-Healing]
context: 【<TDName>「寒毒隐疾」</>寒冷状态发作 10 次造成寒毒隐疾，治疗途径：医馆、温泉、经脉中自疗】

original_en: [<TDName>「Hysteria」</> Low Spirits lead to Hysteria. Too much Hysteria may induce Deluded. Cure: Clinic, Spring, Meridian Self-Healing]
context: 【<TDName>「癫狂隐疾」</>心情低落会造成癫狂隐疾，癫狂隐疾过多时可能走火入魔，治疗途径：医馆、温泉、经脉中自疗】

original_en: [<TDName>「Lampworm」</> Marks parasitifer on Map. Cure: Cure yourself with Inner Kungfu <TDName>「Anti-toxin Spell」</>, or ask the caster to remove the worm]
context: 【<TDName>「灯蛊」</>大地图标记宿主，治疗途径：学会内功<TDName>「解蛊诀」</>自疗或找释蛊人解除】

original_en: [<TDName>「Bloodworm」</> Steals 1 Vigor for caster when triggered. Cure: Cure yourself with Inner Kungfu <TDName>「Anti-toxin Spell」</>, or ask the caster to remove the worm]
context: 【<TDName>「血蛊」</>每次触发，为蛊师吸取 1 点气血，治疗途径：学会内功<TDName>「解蛊诀」</>自疗或找释蛊人解除】

original_en: [<TDName>「Loveworm」</> Forces Intimacy with caster and prevents negative attitudes. Cure: Cure yourself with Inner Kungfu <TDName>「Anti-toxin Spell」</>, or ask the caster to remove the worm]
context: 【<TDName>「情蛊」</>对蛊师无条件情投意合，无法产生负面态度，治疗途径：学会内功<TDName>「解蛊诀」</>自疗或找释蛊人解除】

original_en: [<TDName>「Leg Disability」</> Leg Ailment. Greatly reduces MSPD. Cannot use Kick Moves. Cure: Clinic, cure yourself with Inner Kungfu <TDName>「Golden Acupuncture」</>]
context: 【<TDName>「腿残」</>腿部患疾，移动速度大幅降低，无法使用腿法招式，治疗途径：医馆、学会内功<TDName>「金针度穴功」</>自疗】

original_en: [<TDName>「Blind」</> Eye Ailment. You can only hear. Cannot use Concealed Weapon Moves. Cure: Clinic, cure yourself with Inner Kungfu <TDName>「Golden Acupuncture」</>]
context: 【<TDName>「失明」</>眼部患疾，只能听声辨位，无法使用暗器招式，治疗途径：医馆、学会内功<TDName>「金针度穴功」</>自疗】

original_en: [<TDName>「Ordeal Sigil」</> Takes effect at midnight and noon everyday, randomly creating 3 Hysteria. In most circumstances, it cannot be cleansed.]
context: 【<TDName>「噬心蚀骨符」</>每日子、午发作，随机产生 3 个癫狂隐疾，一般无法解除】

original_en: [Items are bartered in Exchange, which proceeds only if it's fair or if your partner profits]\\n[Allowing your partner to profit increases their Affinity]\\n[You can take more items from someone who likes you, but their Affinity will go down]
context: 【交易为以物易物的形式，公平交易或对方获利才可以进行交易】\\n【让对方获利会增加好感度】\\n【对方有好感时，可以额外拿取对方物品，但会降低已有好感度】

original_en: [After acquiring Tame, you can Tame animals by setting Traps with their favorite food, or by knocking them out.]\\n[<TDName>「Horses」</> can be ridden or harnessed to a carriage. They like Wild Grass.]\\n[<TDName>「Eagles」</> can enter Hawk Eye mode and help track targets. They like Meat.]\\n[<TDName>「Monkeys」</> can beg and deliver resources. They like Pinecones and Plums.]\\n[<TDName>「Snakes」</> can pick locks and use poison without gaining Misdeed. They like Meat and Eggs.]\\n[<TDName>「Martens」</> prompt you when you approach Treasure. The closer you are, the more frequent their prompts. They like Meat and Eggs.]\\n[<TDName>「Chickens」</> lay eggs every day. They like Lampworms, Bloodworms, Loveworms, and Deathworms.]
context: 【学会驯化能力后，使用陷阱并放置动物喜好的食物，或将动物打至眩晕后可以进行驯化】\\n【<TDName>「马」</>可以乘骑和改装马车，喜欢吃杂草】\\n【<TDName>「鹰」</>可以进入鹰眼模式，帮助追踪目标，喜欢吃肉块】\\n【<TDName>「猴」</>可以乞讨和运输物资，喜欢吃松果、梅子】\\n【<TDName>「蛇」</>可以开锁和下毒，不会产生恶行，喜欢吃肉块、蛋】\\n【<TDName>「貂」</>靠近宝藏时会做出提示，越接近提示越频繁，喜欢吃肉块、蛋】\\n【<TDName>「鸡」</>每天可以产蛋，喜欢吃灯虫、血虫、情虫、绝虫】

original_en: [You can gain <TDName>「Kungfu Insight」</> through battle or dummy practice (Sect Training Room). <TDName>「Kungfu Insight」</> can be used to advance Skills.]
context: 【通过战斗可以获得道具：<TDName>「武学心得」</>，也可以使用门派练功房的木人练功获得，<TDName>「武学心得」</>用于进阶绝学】

original_en: [<TDName>If Vigor drops to 0</>, you suffer Meridian Ailments]\\n[Vigor can be restored by sleeping, bathing, or taking food or potions]\\n[You can <TDName>use 1 item</> per turn in battle]
context: 【<TDName>气血为空</>后会造成经脉隐疾】\\n【睡觉、泡澡可以恢复气血，也可以通过食物和丹药恢复气血】\\n【在战斗中每回合可以<TDName>使用1个道具</>】

original_en: [<TDName>「Create Sect」</> Open Social and spend money to create your own sect]\\n[<TDName>「Join Sect」</> View sect info and entry requirements on Bulletin Boards at Sect Mountain Gates. You can join a sect if you meet their requirements. After joining, you can view Sect options in Social]\\n[If you meet the entry requirements of a sect, you may receive an invitation to join via <TDName>Pigeon Post</> ]
context: 【<TDName>「建立门派」</>打开社交界面，花费金钱可以创建属于自己的门派】\\n【<TDName>「加入门派」</>门派山门前的布告栏可以查看门派信息以及加入门派的条件，满足条件即可加入门派，加入后可在社交界面查看门派功能】\\n【当你满足某个门派的入门条件时，有时会收到邀请加入门派的<TDName>飞鸽传书</>】

original_en: [<TDName>「Create Party Flag」</> Add the current lot to your sect's Influence]\\n[<TDName>「Build Houses」</> You can also add functional facilities, such as cages, grocery cabinets, bookcases, dummies, and beds, for your disciples. ]\\n[<TDName>「Create Sect Rules」</> Once becoming the Master, you can manage your sect in Social by creating Entry Requirements, Sect Taboos, and Tax Rules]. Members must meet all Entry Requirements in order to join your sect. We recommend selecting a small number of rules. \\n[<TDName>「Recruitment」</> Interact with others and invite them to join your sect. Meet their demands and they'll join. Others may also request to join when they see your Entry Requirements.]\\n[<TDName>「Expand Influence」</> Only one Party Flag is allowed in each region. You can take control of a region by taking down other Party Flags and setting up your own. Non-sect members in the region must pay taxes according to the sect's Tax Rules. ]
context: 【<TDName>「建造门派大旗」</>可以将当前地块划归为门派的势力范围】\\n【<TDName>「建造房屋」</>并且放置不同的功能设施，例如：牢笼、杂货柜、书架、木人、床等等设施，提供给门派弟子使用。】\\n【<TDName>「制定门规」</>成为掌门后，在社交界面可以对门派进行管理，制定入门条件、门派禁忌、税收规则】，满足设定的所有入门条件才可入门，建议选择少量规则。\\n【<TDName>「招募人才」</>主动与他人进行交互，请求并邀请加入门派，满足对方的条件即可招募成功。也会有其他人根据你设定的入门条件慕名来投】\\n【<TDName>「扩张势力」</>每个区域只可以存在一个门派大旗，拆除他人的门派大旗，建造自己的门派大旗就可以掌控这个区域，区域内的非门派成员都要遵循门派制定的税收规则缴纳税金。】

original_en: 【<TDName>「Issue command」</>You can issue commands to fellow disciples within the sect who are one level lower in position, and edit detailed content in the command page of the social interface】\\n【<TDName>「Reputation」</>By increasing the favorability of members in your faction towards you, you can increase your reputation (by challenging and winning against members with higher sect positions, you can gain a large amount of reputation). Reputation can unlock the permission to use facilities in the sect and offer discounts on exchanging unique skills, internal skills, equipment, and other resources】
context: 【<TDName>「发布命令」</>可以向门派内职务低一级的同门发布命令，在社交界面的命令分页中编辑详细内容】\\n【<TDName>「声望」</>提升势力中成员对你的好感度，即可提高声望（对门派职务比你高的成员发起挑战并胜利，可获得大量声望），声望可以解锁在门派中使用设施的权限以及兑换绝学、内功、装备等资源的优惠】

original_en: 【<TDName>「Duties」</>When the reputation meets the requirements of the next position, you can seek promotion evaluation from the leader to obtain promotion. The higher the position, the more disciples you can command】\\n【<TDName>「Learning Art」</>The bookshelf of the sect records all the unique skills and internal skills entered by the sect leader. You can purchase corresponding unique skills and internal skills to increase reputation and reduce expenses】\\n【<TDName>「Practice」</>The wooden figures of the sect can train their martial arts skills to perfection, and the ultimate challenge in martial arts can obtain martial arts experience】\\n【<TDName>「Articles」</>A variety of business facilities of the school can buy goods, and an increase in popularity will reduce costs.】
context: 【<TDName>「职务」</>声望达到下一个职务需求时可以找掌门进行职务晋升评定获得晋升，职务越高可以命令的弟子越多】\\n【<TDName>「学艺」</>门派的书架中记录了掌门录入的所有绝学和内功，可以购买对应的绝学书和内功，提高声望会降低花费】\\n【<TDName>「练功」</>门派的木人可以将武技训练至圆满，武学极限挑战可以获得武学心得】\\n【<TDName>「物品」</>门派的各种经营设施可以购买物品，提高声望会降低花费】

original_en: [The default Move deck contains only <TDName>「1 Palm, 1 Fist, and 1 Kick Move」</>. You gain <TDName>「1 Concealed Weapon Move」</> after equipping a Concealed Weapon, and <TDName>「1 Weapon Move」</> after equipping a Weapon]\\n[A skill's <TDName>「 required number of Moves」</> will be added to your Move deck. For example, Tortoise Fist requires 3 Fists. Once equipped, 3 Fists will be added to your deck.]\\n[If you equip a Skill that requires <TDName>「Weapon Moves」</> without equipping a Weapon, Weapon Moves will not be added to your Move deck. Same for Concealed Weapons. ]
context: 【默认招式库中只有<TDName>「1掌法1拳法1腿法招式」</>，装备暗器后会增加<TDName>「1暗器招式」</>，装备兵器后会增加<TDName>「1兵器招式」</>】\\n【绝学的<TDName>「招式需求数量」</>会增加到招式库中，例如王八拳需求3个拳法，装备后招式库中会增加3个拳法】\\n【装备了需求<TDName>「兵器招式」</>的绝学，但是没有装备兵器，则招式库中还是没有兵器招式，暗器同理。】

original_en: [You can use <TDName>「DEF Move」</> to keep your Moves until the next turn.]\\n[Once you reach <TDName>「Technique Sage」</>, DEF Moves can copy<TDName> 2 </> Moves to next turn.]\\n[Some Gear can add starting Moves.]
context: 【利用<TDName>「守招」</>可以将招式保存到下个回合】\\n【<TDName>「武技圆满」</>后守招可以复制<TDName> 2 </>个招式到下个回合】\\n【装备中也有增加初始招式的词条】

original_en: [<TDName>「Censer」</> Give donations to lessen Misfortune. People can pay to reduce Misfortune.]\\n[<TDName>「Bar for 4」</> A simple wooden table for four. People can pay to relax here.]\\n[<TDName>「Bar for 2」</> A lavish wine table for two. People can pay to relax here.]\\n[<TDName>「Sickbed」</> A place to wait for healing. People can pay to use it.]\\n[<TDName>「Potion Shelf」</> A place to sell potions. People can buy potions they need.]\\n[<TDName>「Wine Shelf」</> A place to sell food and drinks. People can buy refreshments here.]\\n[<TDName>「Weapon Shelf」</> A place to sell Weapons/Concealed Weapons. People can buy powerful gear here.]\\n[<TDName>「Counter」</> Stores curios. People can buy treasure here.]\\n[<TDName>「Grocery Cabinet」</> Stores materials and goods. People can buy materials here.]\\n[<TDName>「Hanger」</> A place to sell hats, tops, and pants. People can buy powerful gear here.]\\n[<TDName>「Spring」</> Have a bath to restore Vigor/Energy and cure Ailments. People can pay for relaxation or healing.]\\n[<TDName>「Stable」</> A place to sell horses and travel afar.]\\n[<TDName>「Bookcase」</> A place to keep Skill Manuals and Inner Kungfu Manuals. People can buy manuals to enhance themselves.]\\n[<TDName>「City Guardian」</> A place to pray. You earn money when someone prays here.]
context: 【<TDName>「香炉」</>可以投放香火钱，减少厄运，有人需求减少厄运时会来消费】\\n【<TDName>「四座酒桌」</>容纳四人的简易木桌，有人需求娱乐时会来消费】\\n【<TDName>「双座酒桌」</>容纳双人的豪华酒桌，有人需求娱乐时会来消费】\\n【<TDName>「病床」</>可以等待治疗，有人需求治疗时会来消费】\\n【<TDName>「药架」</>可以贩卖丹药，有人需求丹药时会来购买】\\n【<TDName>「酒架」</>可以贩卖酒水和食物，有人需求酒水和食物时会来购买】\\n【<TDName>「兵器架」</>可以贩卖兵器和暗器，有人需求装备强度时会来购买】\\n【<TDName>「柜台」</>存放珍品的容器，有人需求珍品会来购买】\\n【<TDName>「杂货柜」</>可以存放货物和材料，有人需求材料时会来购买】\\n【<TDName>「衣架」</>可以贩卖帽子、衣服和裤子，有人需求装备强度时会来购买】\\n【<TDName>「温泉」</>可以泡澡，恢复气血内力以及治疗隐疾，有人需求娱乐或治疗时会来消费】\\n【<TDName>「马棚」</>可以贩卖马匹和远程移动】\\n【<TDName>「书架」</>可以录入绝学书、内功书，有人需求成长时会来购买】\\n【<TDName>「城隍爷」</>可以进行祈求，有人祈求就会获得收益】

original_en: [<TDName>「Bonfire」</> A place to cook. Higher Cooking allows you to prepare higher-quality food. You can also apply statuses to bonfires to meet the requisites of advanced recipes.]\\n[<TDName>「Farmland」</> A place to plant herbs. Use poo as fertilizers to speed up growth.]\\n[<TDName>「Crucible」</> A place to make potions. Higher Leechcraft allows you to concoct more advanced potions.]\\n[<TDName>「Furnace」</> A place to forge Weapons and Concealed Weapons. Higher Forging gives a higher chance of producing high-quality arms, at the cost of more resources consumed.]\\n[<TDName>「Loom」</> A place to weave hats, tops, and pants. Higher Weaving gives a higher chance of producing high-quality outfits, at the cost of more resources consumed.]
context: 【<TDName>「火堆」</>可以进行烹饪，烹饪能力越高可以烧制更高品质的食物，还可以对火堆施加状态以满足高级食谱的需求】\\n【<TDName>「田地」</>可以种植各种草药，种植后可以消耗粑粑施肥，加快成熟效率】\\n【<TDName>「药炉」</>可以炼制丹药，医术能力越高可以炼制更高级的丹药】\\n【<TDName>「熔炉」</>可以锻造兵器和暗器，锻造能力越高产出的高品质兵器概率越高，但是消耗的资源也会增加】\\n【<TDName>「织机」</>可以织造帽子、衣服、裤子等服装，织造能力越高产出的高品质服装概率越高，但是消耗的资源也会增加】

original_en: [<TDName>「Simple Trap」</> Place it on the ground to deal DMG to anyone who steps on it]\\n[<TDName>「Cage」</> Detains enemies.]\\n[<TDName>「Archer Tower」</> Fends off invaders. Allows targeting of attackers.]
context: 【<TDName>「简易陷阱」</>可放置在地上，对踩中者造成伤害】\\n【<TDName>「牢笼」</>可以关押敌人】\\n【<TDName>「箭塔」</>可以防御入侵者，允许筛选攻击目标】

original_en: [If you run the only establishment in the world, people don't have alternative options]\\n[You can spend money to <TDName>Advertise</> your facility. Customers will choose your facility over others for a period of time.]
context: 【世界中只存在你的经营设施时，其他人没有选择】\\n【设施可以花费金钱进行<TDName>广而告之</>，一定时间内顾客会首选你的设施】

original_en: [<TDName>「Expand Lots」</> You will get a Pigeon Post after completing a Lot Trial Quest. Click and select the option to expand lots. You can also spend money to expand lots at Cargo Ships.]\\n[<TDName>「Lot Terrain」</> Some lots have harsh terrain with constant Cold, Heat, or Poison Gas. ]\\n[<TDName>「Special Lots」</> Each special lot has its own requisite conditions. You must fulfill these conditions to expand your land.]\\n[<TDName>「Random Lots」</> Influence, Bandit, and Wonders lots are generated randomly as the world grows.]
context: 【<TDName>「开辟地块」</>完成地块历练任务会获得飞鸽传书，点击后可以选择开辟新的地块。也可以通过商船花费金钱扩张地块】\\n【<TDName>「地块环境」</>恶劣环境的地块会带有寒冷、灼热、毒瘴的持续状态。】\\n【<TDName>「特殊地块」</>每个特殊地块的放置都有各自的需求条件，达成时才可以扩张】\\n【<TDName>「随机地块」</>势力地块、盗匪地块以及奇遇地块都是随着世界扩张和交互随机产生的】

original_en: [Use 「Blueprints」 to place building blueprints you designed.]\\n[You can add facilities during construction, or build a shell and add contraptions in Backpack later]\\n[Construct more buildings to level up your 「Establishment」 ability and unlock more building templates]
context: 【使用「设计蓝图」可以直接摆放自己设计的建筑蓝图】\\n【设施可以在建造过程中摆放，也可以只建造毛坯房，之后在背包中自由添加摆放机关】\\n【建造更多的建筑可以提升「营造能力」，解锁更多建筑模板】

original_en: [Press [1=31] to Sneak]\\n[A detection circle is shown in Sneak. When the inner circle moves close to the target, you'll be detected. The outer circle signifies the range of sound.]\\n[The Sensation of individuals and animals is affected by various factors. For example, a blind person is more sensitive to sound.]\\n[Level up your Sneak ability, and use Haystacks and Midnight Robes to decrease the radius of your detection circle and reduce the risk of being detected.]\\n[Midnight Robes are more effective at night.]
context: 【使用快捷键 [1=31] 可以进入潜行状态】\\n【潜行状态时会出现噪声圈，内圈贴近目标时，目标会立刻发现，外圈则代表声音的传播距离】\\n【每个人或动物的多种因素会改变他们的感知范围，例如瞎眼对声音的感知更敏锐】\\n【提升潜行能力，以及使用潜行草垛和夜行衣都会增强潜行能力，缩小噪声圈的范围，降低被目标发现的风险】\\n【夜行衣在夜晚的功效更强】

original_en: [Before the auction begins, you can click Add Auction Item to list your own items for auction.]\\n[At the end of the auction, proceeds from sold items will be sent to your inventory after deducting a 10% auction fee.]\\n[Your unsold items will be returned to your inventory. Other items will be relisted at the next auction.]
context: 【拍卖会开始前可以点击增加拍卖物按钮将自身物品放到拍卖会上拍卖】\\n【拍卖物品所得会先扣取10%作为拍卖手续费后在拍卖会结束时发放到玩家包裹】\\n【流拍的玩家物品会返还到玩家包裹，其他物品会留存到下次拍卖会继续拍卖】

original_en: [<TDName>「Greet」</> Default shortcut Q. Creatures nearby will respond, and people with Affinity over 600 will come over to team up.]\\n[<TDName>「Team up」</> You can team up with people with Affinity over 600.]\\n[<TDName>「Order」</> Default shortcut E. In Order mode, you can issue orders to teammates within a certain range.]
context: 【<TDName>「打招呼」</>默认快捷键 Q ，附近的生物会做出响应，好感大于 600 的人会自动过来组队】\\n【<TDName>「组队」</>大于 600 好感的人可以组队】\\n【<TDName>「命令」</>默认快捷键 E ，进入命令模式后可以在一定范围内对队友发布命令】

original_en: [<TDName>「Debate」</>Debate is a milder form of combat that can be used to negotiate trade prices, avoid physical fights, ease relations, and even forge alliances. ]\\n[<TDName>「Debate Mechanics」</> Once you start a Debate, the confrontation starts automatically. In each round, you can draw up to 9 Verbal Duels from your Verbal Duel Pile for the encounter]\\n[<TDName>「Debate Mechanics」</> At the end of each round, you can choose one additional unlocked Verbal Duel from your Verbal Duels Deck in the Abilities System to use with your Verbal Duel Pile]\\n[<TDName>「Debate Mechanics」</> In a Debate, you battle your opponent with Eloquence. The difference between your Eloquence determines how the top Confrontation bar progresses]\\n[<TDName>「Victory Conditions」</> Both parties start the Debate with their current Spirits. You win when the opponent's Spirits becomes 0]\\n[<TDName>「Victory Rewards」</> After winning a Debate, you can choose a Victory Objective to influence your opponent, such as reducing their Vigor or inducing Admire toward you. If you meet the requirements for crafting Verbal Duels in a Debate, you can choose more powerful Ultimate Victory Objectives. ]\\n[<TDName>「Penalty for Losing」</> If you lose, your Spirits is decreased by 30%]
context: 【<TDName>「嘴炮介绍」</>嘴炮交锋作为更加温和的战斗方式将融入游戏的多个系统中，例如降低交易花费，避免武力战斗，缓和双方关系，甚至达成势力外交等等。】\\n【<TDName>「嘴炮交锋」</>进入嘴炮战斗后，自动开始交锋，每轮交锋从嘴炮栏中抽取最多 9 个嘴炮用于交锋】\\n【<TDName>「嘴炮交锋」</>每轮嘴炮结束时，可以从能力系统已经收集解锁的嘴炮库中，选择增加一个嘴炮，来搭配自己的嘴炮栏】\\n【<TDName>「嘴炮交锋」</>交锋时，比拼双方的口水值，双方口水值相减后，影响顶部交锋条的推进】\\n【<TDName>「胜利条件」</>双方当前的心境值作为嘴炮交锋的初始进度，对方数值为 0 时，即可胜利】\\n【<TDName>「胜利结果」</>胜利后，可以选择一个胜利目标对对手产生影响，如减少气血，对你产生欣赏等，如果在一场嘴炮战斗中达成合成嘴炮的条件还可以选择更加强力的终极胜利目标。】\\n【<TDName>「失败惩罚」</>失败后，降低 30% 心境】

original_en: You will fail when Vigor is empty

context: 本回合，敌人即将打出的招式

original_en: Drag your Moves to counter opponent’s attack
context: 拖动自己的招式与敌人对招

original_en: Activate Skill by delivering its required number of Moves in one turn.
context: 一回合打出绝学需要的招式数量就可以激活绝学。

original_en: After all these years you finally became an adult...
I see that you have an extraordinary countenance. You must be a rare kungfu prodigy. I want to pass my own unique kungfu arts to you. Are you interested?
context: 我观你天庭饱满、骨骼清奇，必是百年难得一见的武学奇才，我有一套自创的绝世武功欲传授给你，如何？

original_en: Yo, noble hero, spare some change my way. Or a snack to munch on, brighten up my day!
context: 走过一家又一家，碰见大侠夸一夸；大侠英俊又潇洒，身手矫健又威武；大侠你吃肉又喝酒，乞丐我三天饿九顿，给个馍，给口汤，祝恁长命又健康！

original_en: I've always wondered what it takes to establish yourself in the martial world. Your keen eyes and way with words speak of great wisdom. Could you offer me your counsel?
context: 在下一直不明白，若人要想在江湖中立足，最重要的是什么？我观阁下目光如炬、谈吐非凡！应是有大智慧之人！是否能指点在下？

original_en: From your striking bearing and renown, I'd wager you're one of great honor. I have a wealthy relative blessed with a fair maiden, peerless beauty she is. You two are made for each other, so I thought I'd play matchmaker if you're so inclined. How do you take to the idea, good sir?
context: 少侠相貌堂堂，声名远赫，当是重情重义之人！我有一位亲戚家世丰厚，他有一女风华绝代待字闺中，我有意为两位牵缘搭线成就一番佳缘。不知少侠意下如何？

original_en: I'm afflicted with a curious poison...It can only be cured by a strike to an acupoint with intense Inner Kungfu. Please, could you save me?
context: 我……我身中奇毒，需内功高深之人在我膻中穴轻拍一掌方可解毒，阁下可否救我！

original_en: [#1You] are seriously ill. I suggest you go to the Clinic at 「Flora Valley」 later on. Here is a 「Marrow Refining Pill」. It can help you heal some of the ailments!
context: [#1你]身患重疾，最好找「百花谷」的医馆治疗一番，我这有一颗「洗髓丹」给你，姑且可以帮你先治疗一些隐疾！

original_en: I’ve run out of money recently. Give everything you got to me,now!
context: 大爷我最近手头有点紧，把你身上值钱的东西都交出来，否则有你好看的。

original_en: We’re getting along with each other. How about we swear to become brothers?
context: 你我性情相投，不如结为异姓兄弟可好？

original_en: Trees live on mountains and branches live on tree. My heart lives for you but you do not see.
context: 山有木兮木有枝，心悦君兮君不知

original_en: You’re not wearing enough. It’s too cold outside. Put this on.
context: 天寒地冻的，你衣衫如此单薄，这个御寒的衣服拿取穿吧。

original_en: You must be homeless,right? I heard there is a good place to build Residence in Longting. You may build your own house there as a shelter to resist coldness and restore Vigor.
context: 我看你居无定所，我听说龙亭一带有适合建造民居的地方，不妨去那儿修一座自己的房子，可做安身之所，以抵御寒冷和恢复气血。

original_en: [#1You] look upset. Don't repress your eros. Let's go out and have some fun!
context: [#1你]看起来似乎心情烦闷？憋久了可是会伤身的，不妨去找点乐子？

original_en: Bro, did [#1you] know about a kungfu manual called 「Extermination」? Legend has it the one who acquires it will become invincible! Could you 「borrow」 it for me?
context: [#1你]可否听说过一本武学秘籍「灭·绝」？传闻练成便可天下无敌！可否帮我「借来」一阅？

original_en: Your Qinggong is impressive. But to become a Qinggong guru,you still need a help of a stone!
context: 这位仁兄，我看你轻功不错，不过若想轻功大成，还需一奇石相助！

original_en: Did you know there’s a treasure chest in Longting?
context: 你可听说龙亭这有一宝箱？

original_en: Warrior,you look like a marital artist. Do you know Inner Kungfu can be passed on from others?
context: 少侠，我看你像是武林中人，可知内功可以通过他人传授？

original_en: Why are you dressed in rags? You should buy yourself some clothes at the Fabric Shop!
context: 你怎么衣衫褴褛的，去布庄做些衣服穿吧！

original_en: What illness would [#1you] like me to cure?
[#1You] have impressive kungfu. Care to show me a move or two? !
context: [#1你]一身武艺实在惊人，是否能指点在下一二？！

original_en: Oooh! What keen eyes and sturdy gait. A presence most splendid. I sense raw talent here! So... Want to learn a thing or two? How's that sound?
context: 噫？你天庭饱满，双目炯炯有神，步履沉稳有力，双臂似风！好一块武道璞玉！怎么样？有没有兴趣和我学两手？

original_en: I don't have much use for these, but they may prove helpful to [#1you]. Here, you can have them.
context: 我这有些用不上的东西，可能对[#1你]有些帮助，就赠送与你吧！

original_en: I'm grateful for everything you've done. If you're willing, I wish to become sworn brothers with you. I'm prepared to stand by you, through thick and thin. I'll be truly honored.
context: 近来得到阁下不少关照，我甚是感激。若阁下不嫌弃，我愿与阁下义结金兰！从此结为异姓手足！两肋插刀！还望成全！

original_en: I...I've long adored you, good sir. Would you consider uniting our fates? I pledge to stay by your side till the end of our lives.
context: 我……我倾慕大侠你已有时日，我愿与你结为连理！从此白头偕老！

original_en: I sense you bear an Ailment. Permit me to examine your Meridians and treat your Ailments?
context: 观你身患隐疾，我可否助你梳理经脉治疗隐疾？

original_en: Why are [#1you] so frail? What happened to your Vigor? Here, have a seat, let me help you heal.
context: [#1你]怎么那么虚？气血怎会亏空如此？快坐下，我来帮你治疗调息！

original_en: I'm in good spirits today. Want to join me for some fun?
context: 最近心情不错，和我一起去游乐一番如何？

original_en: That's too good to be true. I sense something dodgy here!
context: 那么好的事情会落我头上？必定有诈！

original_en: Man, I feel bad for him. I can part with a few coins.
context: 看他可怜，随便给一点吧？

original_en: Give your help whatever it takes 「give everything in your Backpack」
context: 倾家荡产也要帮忙「背包所有物品给他」

original_en: Of course it’s the most powerful kungfu! Nobody can beat me any more!
context: 当然是绝世武功，走遍天下都不怕！

original_en: Countless wealth! They said wealth can even make a ghost do donkey’s work!
context: 花不完的银子！！俗话说，有钱能使磨推鬼。

original_en: Friendship! Meet and befriend all heroes!
context: 江湖道义！结交天下朋友。

original_en: I’m too young for this. Thanks.
Spend more money to get out of troubles...
I give you my heart and the rest of my life.
context: 愿得一心人，白头不相离。

original_en: A petal fell in the stream of love,which inexorably rushed by.
Where shall we go to have fun?
Ok. Where can I find this manual now?
context: 好的，那这本秘籍如今流落何方？

original_en: You’re on your own. It’s none of my business! !
Oh? How to pass it on?
Let me teach you a Skill!
context: 那就传授一门绝学给你！

original_en: I only want to lie down for a while...
I’m so lucky! A new kungfu acquired! Power boosted!
context: 真是好运啊~~习得一门新武艺，实力大增！

original_en: The kungfu taught by 「{0}」 is awful. Chi became unsteady in your Meridians... 「Inner Injury increased」
context: 「{0}」传授给你的功法简直一塌糊涂，导致你经脉错乱...「内伤增加」

original_en: 「{0}」 thought you overlooked him. Attitude toward you:「Despise」
context: 「{0}」感觉你看不起他，对你产生了态度：「鄙视」

original_en: 「{0}」 thought you were so poor and gave you 15 Coins. Attitude toward you:「Sympathy」
context: 「{0}」看你太可怜，给了你15个铜钱~对你产生了态度：「怜悯」

original_en: You feel your soul is refined. Vigor +100
context: 你感觉自己的灵魂得到了升华，气血 + 100。

original_en: 「{0}」 waved the sleeves and used some dirty tricks. You feel faint. 「Poison Gas +3」
context: 「{0}」轻挥衣袖，暗使手段。你感到一丝恍惚。「毒瘴+3」

original_en: 「{0}」 became your dear friend. Attitude toward you:「Admire」
context: 「{0}」成为你的亲密挚友。对你产生了态度：「欣赏」

original_en: A woman became intimate with you. Her debts were also transferred to you... 「Coins -10,000」
context: 一名女子与你情投意合，她的债务也转嫁给了你……「铜钱-10000」

original_en: A woman became intimate with you.
context: 一名女子与你情投意合。

original_en: 「{0}」sighed and gazed at you with sadness.
context: 「{0}」唉声叹气，无比惋惜的看了看你。

original_en: You clapped. 「{0}」 spit a mouthful of purple blood and 「{0}」’s face turned red. Attitude toward you:「Grateful」
context: 你轻拍一掌，「{0}」吐出一口紫血，面色转红。对你产生了态度「感激」

original_en: You clapped. 「{0}」 fell down and screamed!
context: 你轻拍一掌，「{0}」应声倒下，翻身大喊！

original_en: 「{0}」 fainted as the poison took effect!
「{0}」 glanced at you and took off the disguise.
「{0}」 decided to teach you a lesson! !!
Obtained a clothes to resist cold.
context: 获得一件抵抗寒冷的衣服

original_en: Build the residence to shelter yourself from the cold and restore Vigor in it!
context: 建好民居，你就有了一处容身之所了，可以抵御寒冷和恢复气血！

original_en: Having a hot spring bath,taking a sip of wine at the tavern,or listening to melodies at the Music House will cheer you up!
context: 温泉泡个澡、酒馆喝口酒、乐楼听个小曲，都可以让你心情好起来！

original_en: 「Extermination」 has been hidden at a sect’s hall!
context: 「灭·绝」这本秘籍似乎被藏在了某个门派的大殿内！

original_en: That stone lies on the Dragonhead in Longting. Find a way to get there on your own!
context: 该奇石位于龙亭龙头之上，至于怎么过去，你自己想办法吧！

original_en: Believe it or not,it’s up to you!
You taught 「{0}」 a Skill. Attitude toward you:「Grateful」
context: 你传授了一门绝学给「{0}」，对你产生了态度：「感激」

original_en: You refused 「{0}」’s request to become brothers!
context: 你拒绝了「{0}」的义结金兰请求！

original_en: You refused 「{0}」’s request to become partners!
context: 你拒绝了「{0}」的结为连理请求！

original_en: You refused 「{0}」’s offer to cure your Ailment!
context: 你拒绝了「{0}」对你的隐疾治疗！

original_en: You refused 「{0}」’s offer to restore your Vigor!
context: 你拒绝了「{0}」对你的气血治疗！

original_en: It seems 「{0}」 is taking you somewhere to have some fun!
context: 「{0}」似乎要带你去某个地方娱乐一番！

original_en: You refused 「{0}」’s invitation to have fun together!
context: 你拒绝了「{0}」对你的娱乐邀请！

original_en: The Kungfu Contest will be held in a half of day,
context: 将于半日后召开武林大会,

original_en: The Kungfu Contest can’t get started,because no attendants were here! !!
context: 由于本届武林大会，无人到场，武林大会召开失败！！！

original_en: The Kungfu Contest can’t get started,because no other attendants were here! !!
context: 由于本届武林大会，其他人无法到场，武林大会召开失败！！！

original_en: After brutal fights,「{0}」 became the Champion.
context: 经过一番激烈的角逐，「{0}」成为了盟主
武林大会 · 即将召开
是否要退出此次拍卖会！

original_en: {0} offered the highest bid ({1}) and obtained the item
No one interested. This item will be relisted at the next auction.
context: 无人对此物感兴趣，流拍到下次拍卖会

original_en: That concludes our auction! Congratulations to all successful bidders. To those who came up empty-handed, don't lose heart. Stay tuned for our next auction. You may find something more remarkable!
context: 本次拍卖会到此结束！恭喜诸位获得心仪的宝物，没有收获的朋友也不必气馁。下一次可能会有更好的宝物，期待诸位再次光临。

original_en: You don’t have enemies in your last lifetime
context: 你的上一世没有结怨的人

original_en: You’ve got no Concealed Weapon yet

original_en: EA version (V0.8.0.0) preview:\\n<TDName>[Remove the limit on the number of plots]</>\\n<TDName>[Overall performance optimization]</> Optimize the efficiency of running a large number of NPCs and plots\\n<TDName>[Sandbox mode]</> Can create custom small worlds with multiple data, characters can freely switch between multiple worlds\\n<TDName>[Multiple character unlocking]</> You can marry yourself, give birth to yourself and kill yourself\\n<TDName>[Add a lot of adventure events] </>Richer random events\\n<TDName>[Childbirth system]</> Inherit according to the bloodline talent of parents\\n<TDName>[Function of Fengyun Temple]</> Supplement the worldview\\n<TDName>[Supplement and optimization of AI content] </>More interactive content and improved sense of immersion\\n<TDName>[Add more stunts and internal exercises]</>\\n<TDName>[Add more plots]</>\\n<TDName>[Add external use of hidden weapons]</>\\n<TDName>[Add details of actions]</>\\n<TDName>[Reset wooden man function and role]</>\\n<TDName>[More character suits]</>
context: EA版本（V0.8.0.0）预览：\\n<TDName>「去除地块数量限制」</>\\n<TDName>「整体性能优化」</> 优化大量NPC与地块时的运行效率\\n<TDName>「沙盒模式」</> 可创建自定义多种数据的小世界，角色可以任意切换多个世界\\n<TDName>「多角色开启」</> 可以自己娶自己生自己杀自己\\n<TDName>「补充大量奇遇事件」 </>更丰富的随机事件\\n<TDName>「生娃系统」</> 根据父母血脉天赋进行传承\\n<TDName>「幻魔寺作用」</> 世界观补充\\n<TDName>「AI内容的补充与优化」 </>更多的可交互内容与代入感提升\\n<TDName>「增加更多绝学与内功」</>\\n<TDName>「增加更多地块」</>\\n<TDName>「增加暗器外部使用作用」</>\\n<TDName>「动作细节补充」</>\\n<TDName>「重置木人功能与作用」</>\\n<TDName>「更多角色套装」</>
