original_en: Use Art of Marrow Refining Manual
Bandit Land Mass Trial completed. Treasure Map obtained.
context: 完成盗匪地块历练，获得藏宝图奖励

original_en: Cut it out! Don't yell! I'm the only one who can hear you here. It's been a century, and you've arrived, at long last...
context: 停停停！！别喊了！这里只有我能听到你的声音，苦等百年，老夫总算等到你了...

original_en: Who are you? How come I can’t see you? Are you a human,or a ghost?
context: 你是谁？我怎么看不到你？？你是人是鬼....

original_en: Humph! Of course I'm human! Ah well, I'll let it pass. \\nI am the <TDName>「Heavenly Saint」</>. Just call me <TDName>「St. Heavens」</>. \\nAs for why you can hear me...I'm a Guru in <TDName>「Whispered Secret」</>. Such a feat is but a breeze to me.
context: 哼！老夫当然是人！罢了罢了，老夫不和你这小辈一般见识。\\n老夫是<TDName>「天圣老人」</>，你唤我一声<TDName>「天老」</>便是。\\n你能听到我的声音，那是因为老夫的<TDName>「传音入密」</>已是大成，在这方天地中传音给你不是难事。

original_en: <TDName>「St.」</>……<TDName>「Heavens」</>? What is this place? Where are you hiding? ?
context: <TDName>「天」</>……<TDName>「老」</>？这是什么地方？你又藏在哪里？？

original_en: I've strode these lands for centuries, and amassed no shortage of foes. Should word of our meeting spread too soon, I fear I might be forced to endure another hundred years. \\nKnow simply that this land is called <TDName>「Great Wilds」</>. The very place where you and I are trapped. You must hasten to master strength and ascend to <TDName>「Champion」</>. When that time comes, I shall reveal to you how to free me from my confinement.
context: 老夫纵横寰宇百年，手下仇家无数，若是提前被人知道你我关系，老夫怕不是还要再等个数百年？\\n你只需知道，这里名为<TDName>「大荒界」</>，是你与老夫被困之地，当今需首要之事，就是你需要尽快增强实力好坐上<TDName>「武林盟主」</>之位。届时再告诉你如何助老夫脱困。

original_en: Of course, I shall not let you go unprepared. All martial arts in the <TDName>「Great Wilds」</> stem from my teachings. You bear my sigil; as long as you acquire a kungfu technique, mastery will come with ease. \\nTake this <TDName>「Heavenly Scrolls」</>. Should you face challenges, I shall provide answers. May you rise swiftly to greatness. This serves both our interests.
context: 当然，老夫也不会让你吃亏，这<TDName>「大荒界」</>所有的武学都是老夫所学，你有老夫的印记，所以只要学会很快就可以精通。\\n这<TDName>「天书宝典」</>你且收下，遇到困难之处老夫自会解答。只望你能早日成就霸业，这于你我是两全其美之事。

original_en: The <TDName>「Heavenly Scrolls」</> contains the essence of my knowledge. Its wisdom will be unveiled with your Trials.
context: <TDName>「天书宝典」</>是老夫我的心念结晶，它的内容会随着你的历练逐步显现。

original_en: I suppose I have no other choice. But why is this <TDName>「Great Wilds」</> so tiny?
context: 看来只能如此了，但这<TDName>「大荒界」</>怎么那么小？

original_en: Tiny? \\n……\\nAlas, it appears too much time has passed. You have forgotten your own nature. Lad, remember this: You are a <TDName>「Cultivator」</>. Once you regain your strength, you will come to understand the many secrets of this world.
context: 小？\\n……\\n罢了，想必时间过去太久，你已经遗忘了自己的本能。小子，你需要记住：作为<TDName>「耕夫」</>，待你实力恢复，你自会领悟这天地中的诸多奥秘。

original_en: So what should I do now?
context: 那我现在应该先做什么？

original_en: ...\\nIndeed, you have forgotten a great deal. Here, let me lend you a hand, as I still have some time. \\nThere is a <TDName>「Regional Trial」</> in every lot in the <TDName>「Great Wilds」</>. You can pass the Trial in this lot first.
context: …………\\n看来你是真的遗忘了很多很多。老夫还有一点时间，且先助你一臂之力。\\n这<TDName>「大荒界」</>的每一处地块，都有一个<TDName>「区域历练」</>，你先把此处地块的历练完成了吧。

original_en: Excellent! Your skills and intellect well exceed my expectations. \\nKeep up the good work. There is hope for my liberation! Hahahaha.
context: 很好！你的身手和智慧远比老夫想象中要好不少！\\n就按照这个步骤，老夫脱困之时已经有希望了！哈哈哈哈。

original_en: Open <TDName>「Pigeon Post」</>, and you'll see how to cultivate the <TDName>「Great Wilds」</>. There are unique resources in each region. \\nUse them to help you grow. Know that the world is a complicated place. Tread with care. \\nIf you have deep pockets, try seeking out <TDName>「Cargo Ships」</> to expand new lots.
context: 打开<TDName>「飞鸽传书」</>，你自然就可以看到如何开垦<TDName>「大荒界」</>了。<TDName>「大荒界」</>的每个区域都有独特的资源。\\n善用这些资源来加速你的成长。不过江湖人心纷杂，你平日里也得小心应对。\\n此外，若你身上钱财富裕，也可寻那<TDName>「商船」</>开垦新的地块。

original_en: Hold on! Don't go further into the sea! It's dangerous!
context: 停下！不要再深入外海了！这非常危险！

original_en: What’s out there in the sea? !!
Why? Looks calm enough to me.
context: 为什么？看上去风平浪静啊？

original_en: Go back, now's not the time! When the time comes, I shall tell you everything.
context: 你先回去，现在时机还不够成熟！届时老夫定将会把一切都告知你！

original_en: I need to see for myself what is out there.
context: 我一定要看看外面到底有什么！

original_en: Ah well. A taste of hardship will do the lad some good.
context: 哎，少年人吃吃苦头也好。

original_en: As the world expands, more forces will emerge in the <TDName>「Great Wilds」</>. You won't be able to navigate its treacherous waters without considerable strength. Right now, it's important that you join a sect and build up your skills. From there, you can make your way to your <TDName>「Champion」</> mantle.
context: 世界扩张的同时，<TDName>「大荒界」</>的势力也会越来越多，实力不够是无法应对更加复杂的江湖环境。当务之急是先加入一个门派积累实力，再徐徐图谋<TDName>「武林盟主」</>的宝座。

original_en: How can I join a sect?
There's a <TDName>「Bulletin Board」</> at the Mountain Gate of every sect. You can take a look, see if you meet their Entry Requirements.
context: 每个门派山门外的<TDName>「公告栏」</>都会写有门派的收徒要求，你可以去那边了解一下自己是否符合要求。

original_en: Take heed! <TDName>「Bandits」</> will appear in new lots. Eliminate these thugs, and you can build a Reputation. Remember to demolish their Shacks and Cages, lest other ruffians take shelter again.
context: 请注意！扩张的新地块会出现<TDName>「盗匪」</>，他们都是些江湖败类，铲除他们可以获得江湖名声。但要记得拆毁他们的窝棚与牢笼，否则仍会有恶人来此落草为寇。

original_en: What if I’m no match for them?
Hire bodyguards, or set up traps. Sometimes it's prudent to avoid confrontation. Once you've become stronger and commanded your own forces, these bandits will be nothing more than small-time crooks.
context: 雇佣保镖、安置陷阱。有时候避之锋芒也是一种好选择。待到你实力雄厚，或是组建了自己的势力之后，区区盗匪便不足为惧。

original_en: What else do you want to know about?
How can I join a sect?
There's a Bulletin Board at the Mountain Gate of every sect. You can take a look, see if you meet their Entry Requirements. But I'm not sure whether you're worthy or not.
context: 各个门派的山门都有公告板，你可以去看看符不符合入门条件。不过人家不一定看得上你~~

original_en: Do you know where to find treasure?
Horses like eating grass. Monkeys like pinecones or plums. Martens and snakes like meat and eggs. Eagles like meat.
context: 马喜欢吃草，猴子喜欢吃松果或梅子，貂和蛇喜欢吃肉和蛋，鹰喜欢吃肉。

original_en: When will the Kungfu Contest begin?
context: 武林大会什么时候召开？

original_en: Soon there will be a Kungfu Contest in areas with such a campaign. I can't wait any longer. Is there anything that a martial arts champion can't do? Hahahaha!
context: 只要有武林大会的区域过段时间就会召开了，好期待~~如果能当上武林盟主，那真的是可以为所欲为了，哈哈哈哈。

original_en: You can use your Chi to heal minor injury. If the injury is too severe, you can go to clinic for healing. But Clinics often charge a high fee. . .
context: 小伤的话自己真气贯通就可以治疗了，如果伤势过于严重只能去医馆治疗了，不过他们收费都挺贵的。。。

original_en: Trade, complete commissions, or work at all kinds of stores. But doing illegal business always earns more. Ahaha, just like taking supplements will make you stronger!
context: 交易，帮人完成委托任务，或者去各大店铺打杂。不过怎么都没有干出格的事情来的快哈哈，马无夜草不肥嘛~~~

original_en: Hehe, no one is invincible in this world. You can improve your power by collecting more Skills, Inner Kungfu, Abilities, and Gears. But remember, only the fitting combination means the true power.
context: 呵呵呵~这个世界没有真正的无敌~你可以通过收集绝学、内功、能力、装备来提升实力，不过只有将它们组合搭配好，才能真正强大。

original_en: I heard that you can acquire advanced Qinggong at the Eagle Hunt Platform and Mirror Lake Stonewoods.
context: 我听说在逐鹰台和镜湖石林可以领悟高级轻功。

original_en: You can buy food that grants statuses at the Wine Shelf in the Tavern. You can also apply Cold by praying at the City Guardian Temple for Rain and Snow.
context: 可以在酒馆的酒架购买各种增加状态的食物，城隍庙祈求雨天和雪天也能增加寒冷。

original_en: You can buy the sect's Skill and Inner Kungfu manuals at the Bookcase in the Training Room. Once you've earned enough Prestige in the sect, these manuals are all yours to take.
context: 练功房的书架可以购买本派的绝学和内功，你在本派的声望达到一定高度，这些武学随你自取。

original_en: You can gain Prestige by challenging members of higher rank or completing commissions from sect members. Once your Prestige reaches the requisite for the next level, you can ask the Master for a promotion.
context: 挑战更高职务的人或完成门派中人的委托任务都可以增加门派声望，声望达到下一个职务需求时可以找掌门进行职务晋升评定

original_en: Complete more sect orders, or donate resources to the Warehouse.
context: 多多执行门派命令，或者给库房提交物资。

original_en: What do you usually do in the Training Room?

My daily duties involve checking the equipment in the Training Room, such as the 「Dummies」 and 「Bookcases」. If I notice any issues, I work quickly to make repairs or replacements so everything is in top condition for the disciples.
context: 本人每天最繁重的工作就是检查练功房里的各类设备，如「木人」、「书架」等。一旦发现任何问题都会迅速进行修理与更换，确保它们都处于最佳状态，随时可以供弟子们使用。

original_en: What do you usually do in the Warehouse?
I've managed the Warehouse for some time. My day-to-day involves logging all resource usage so that funds and materials are properly kept for our disciples.
context: 本人担任库房管理已有多时，平日里最主要的工作就是登记门派各类物资的来往情况，确保资金与物资都能妥善保管，以备门派弟子们使用。

original_en: What do you usually do in the Jail?

Well, I may not be a martial arts master, but I've got plenty of experience when it comes to guarding and interrogating prisoners. The good Master has a lot of trust in my work, and has assigned me to handle all the important prisoners. I manage the 「Jail」, where we detain all the rule breakers and troublemakers.
context: 在下虽不精通武艺，但对看守与审问犯人却有着丰富的经验。掌门大人也十分信任在下的工作，所有关键犯人的看管都交由本姓负责。我主要是看管「监牢」，那些触犯门规或者招惹本派的人都归我统一看押。

original_en: What do you usually do at the Tavern?

I make sure that everything runs smoothly, the 「Wine Shelves」 are well-stocked, and the 「Wine Tables」 are making good income. It's fun listening to the drunken ramblings of heroes. It's my dream to run a cozy tavern for my guests.
context: 每天确保酒馆里的一切设施都正常运转，看看「酒架」里的酒水和菜肴是否完备，「酒桌」的收入怎么样？听听大侠们的醉话。我的理想就是能够经营好酒馆，给客人提供一个舒适的环境。

original_en: What do you usually do at the Stable?

I make a living by selling horses and running a station at the 「Stable」. I also have a collection of curios in the Counter, and I sell various goods at the Grocery Cabinet. Unless there's something big going on, you'll usually find me here.
context: 我是靠「马棚」贩卖马匹和驿站来赚钱的，柜台里也有一些我收集到的珍品，杂货柜有一些杂物贩卖。没有重要事情的话我一般都待在这里。

original_en: What do the animals like to eat?
context: 你知道动物都喜欢吃什么？

original_en: From what I know, 「Horses」 like eating wild grass. 「Eagles」 like eating meat. 「Monkeys」 like eating pinecones and plums. 「Snakes」 and 「Martens」 like eating meat and eggs, and 「Chickens」 love all sorts of worms.
context: 我只知道一些，「马」喜欢吃杂草，「鹰」喜欢吃肉块，「猴子」喜欢吃松果、梅子，「蛇」和「貂」喜欢吃肉块、蛋，「鸡」喜欢吃各种虫子。

original_en: What do you usually do at the Smithy?

I make a living by selling forged Weapons and Concealed Weapons at the 「Weapon Shelf」. Whenever I have enough materials, I craft weapons. I have dedicated my life to the forge, and created many weapons renowned in the martial world.
context: 我是靠「武器架」贩卖锻造的兵器和暗器赚钱的。有足够的材料我就会打造兵器。我毕生追求精研炼金炼铁之术，铸出许多神兵利器，传遍武林。

original_en: What do you usually do at the Fabric Shop?

I make a living by selling hats, tops, and pants at the 「Hanger」. Whenever I have enough materials, I weave better outfits. My greatest joy is creating peerless gear for heroes, so that they can command awe as they travel the world.
context: 我是靠「衣架」贩卖织造的帽子、衣服、裤子赚钱的。有足够的材料我就会织造更好的服装。一生最喜欢的，就是能为高手们打造出一件绝世装备，让他们威风凛凛，行走江湖。

original_en: What do you usually do at the Spring?
I make a living by running the 「Spring」. My motivation is simple: I hope more people can enjoy the wonders of hot springs and find blissful respite here.
context: 我是靠经营「温泉」赚钱的，开温泉的理由很简单，就是希望能让更多人体验到温泉的妙用，在此获得愉悦的心情。

original_en: What do you usually do at Langya Pavilion?
I make a living by selling contraptions at the 「Mechanism Shelf」. People come to me for home decorations, hunter's traps, and camouflage tools. That's life for me.
context: 我是靠「机关架」贩卖各种机关赚钱的，江湖中人想要装饰住宅、陷阱狩猎、隐匿藏形都会关照我的生意，这辈子就这样了。

original_en: What do you usually do at the Clinic?

I make a living by treating patients on 「Sickbeds」 and selling potions at the 「Potion Shelf」. In my spare time, I concoct potions and cultivate my inner self. I ask neither the name nor origin of my patients. As long as I can heal them, I'll do my best. That's my philosophy.
context: 我是靠「病床」医治病人「药架」贩卖丹药赚钱的，平时没事就练练丹药、修身养性。武林中人来求医，我从不过问姓名与来历，只要能医治，都会全力以赴。这也是在下的医道之本。

original_en: Come lie down. Let me take a look.
context: 快躺倒病床上，等下我来看看你的病症。

original_en: What do you usually do at the Music House?
Why do I run a Music House? It's simple. I hope more people can appreciate the charm of music. Take a sip, enjoy a melody. What's more delightful than that?
context: 我开设乐楼的理由很简单，就是希望能让更多人欣赏到音乐的魅力，在此喝喝酒听听琴消除疲劳，岂不快哉。

original_en: What do you usually do at the Village?
I come from a long line of framers, so I'm good at planting all sorts of crops. Everyday I tend to my crops in the 「Fields」. People also come to me for herbs.
context: 祖辈都是农人，对种植各类产物颇为擅长。我每天就是看看「田地」种植的作物长势如何，江湖中人有草药的需求也会来采购。

original_en: How can I join a sect?
There's a Bulletin Board at the Mountain Gate of every sect. You can take a look, see if you meet their Entry Requirements. Some sects also send invitations through Pigeon Post.
context: 每个门派山门前都有公告板，你可以去看看是否满足加入条件。有些门派也会主动飞鸽传书邀请你的。

original_en: Give me {0} coins and I’ll join your sect! You’ll be the boss!
context: 给我 {0} 钱，我就加入你的门派，以后就跟你混了！

original_en: Are you messing with me? Ain't got no cash? Get lost!
context: 你是在逗我玩吗？没钱？我才懒得理你！

original_en: I don’t want to join your sect!
This lumber I grew from a shoot! This road I carved with my boot! You want the resources here, {0} coins, if you please!
context: 此树是我栽！此路是我开！想要附近的资源！那得交 {0} 钱来！

original_en: No dough? You ask for this!
Oy oy oy, this is our land! If you wanna put a house here, you gotta cough up {0} coins!
context: 喂喂喂，这里属于我方势力管辖！倘若你想在此建设房屋，拿{0} 钱来！

original_en: If you're so heartless, consider us done. You walk your own road, I'll stick to my trails!
context: 既然你如此狠绝，从此我俩便两不相干，你走你的阳关道，我过我的独木桥！

original_en: You! How can you be so cruel? From now on, we're enemies!
context: 你！你竟然如此狠绝！你我从此势不两立！

original_en: Make peace, not war. Just stay out of my way from now on!
context: 冤家宜解不宜结，从此以后你就不要再来惹我了！

original_en: You want to patch things up? Not without a price, I'm afraid!
context: 你要与我化解仇怨？你不付出点代价我可是不同意啊！

original_en: I want to buy your Residence here.
context: 我想购买阁下的此处民居。

original_en: A master taught you {0} Manual. You mastered it when you were a kid.
context: 前辈将{0}秘籍传授于你，成童时你已融会贯通。

original_en: Your Lineage begins to show,endowing you with a natural aptitude for certain Abilities.
context: 你的血脉传承逐渐显露出来，天生就比常人更加精通一些能力。

original_en: Click an empty Skill slot to equip Skill. Skills increase the number of corresponding Move Decks.
context: 点击绝学空位装备绝学，绝学可以增加相应的招式库数量。

original_en: Click empty Gear slot to equip {0}
<AttiSource>Offer money or gifts to others 5 times</>
context: <AttiSource>累计 5 次施舍或赠与他人财物</>

original_en: <AttiSource>In 3 battles won,show mercy to opponents without demanding items and spare their lives </>
context: <AttiSource>累计 3 次战斗胜利不索要物品饶恕对手，并且不下杀手</>

original_en: <AttiSource>Perform 3 good deeds for people you have Positive Relations with</>
<AttiSource>Refuse Intimacy Relations with the opposite sex twice</>
context: <AttiSource>拒绝 2 次异性的建立情投意合的关系</>

original_en: <AttiSource>Initiate 3 attacks against NPCs who have committed wrongdoing</>
context: <AttiSource>累计 3 次主动攻击做了坏事的NPC时被评价</>
<AttiSource>拥有 3 个至交好友时被评价</>
<AttiSource>累计 4 次拒绝施舍会被评价</>
<AttiSource>累计 3 次战斗胜利下杀手</>

original_en: <AttiSource>Perform 3 bad deeds against people you have Positive Relations with</>
<AttiSource>Become intimate with 3 people of the opposite sex</>
context: <AttiSource>累计与 3 个异性情投意合</>
<AttiSource>累计 2 次主动战斗并且被击败</>
<AttiSource>击杀血亲、情投意合、至交好友</>
确认要清除所有的标记吗？

original_en: 「You can create multiple Miniworlds」\\n「Resetting the Miniworld will clear all its data, keeping only Karma, Lineage, Cultivator, Trial Progress and Fortune Jades! ! ! 」\\n「Each Miniworld has its own areas and features」\\n「Cultivators can enter different Miniworlds anytime」
context: 「你可以创建多个小世界」\\n「重置小世界会清除该世界所有数据，只保留天命、血脉、耕父、历练进度及福玉！！！」\\n「每个小世界都拥有不同的区域和特性」\\n「耕夫可以随时进入不同的小世界」

original_en: This is a beta version. The world size has been restricted. \\nThank you for playing. You can continue playing to experiment with different interactions.
context: 目前是测试版本，世界大小进行了限制。\\n感谢您的试玩，您可以继续游玩，尝试更多的交互机制。

original_en: There's a lot going on in the game. For your first playthrough, be sure to take your time with the tutorial. It'll help you get used to the gameplay. Happy exploring!
context: 游戏机制较复杂，初次游戏强烈建议您仔细阅读新手引导，顺利度过新手期!
{0}生长中\\n距离成熟还需要{1}时辰

original_en: Activate Skill by delivering its required Moves in one turn. Long press to drag Skill.
context: 一回合打出绝学需要的招式就可以激活，长按拖动绝学

original_en: Connect another Move type with Omni Move
context: 连接挂招，可衔接另外一种招式

original_en: Connected 4 of the same Move. Combo Move triggered. Draw 1 Move.
context: 已连接4个相同招式，触发连招，额外抽取1个招式

original_en: You can connect to an Omni Move
Now you can connect an extra Fist Move
context: 这样可以额外连接拳法招式

original_en: Change next Move type with Changeable Move
context: 连接变招，可改变下个招式类型

original_en: Now you can change Palm to Kick
context: 此时就可以将掌法变为腿法
这样还能额外连接另外一种招式

original_en: You can connect all of the same Move
context: 可以连接所有相同招式

original_en: Connect the last Fist. There are no more Moves you can connect.
context: 连接最后一个拳法，此时没有可连接的招式了

original_en: But you can connect a Changeable Move. Now you can connect an extra Move and change its type.
context: 但还可以连接变招，额外连接并改变一个招式类型

original_en: Palm changed to Kick. Now you have 2 different Moves.
context: 将掌法变为腿法，就满足了 2 种不同招式

original_en: Connect an Omni Move and go on to another Move type
context: 还可以继续连接挂招，衔接另外一种招式

original_en: You've used three different Moves in one turn. Surprise Move triggered.
context: 这样就满足一回合打出三种不同招式，触发奇招

original_en: Connected 3 different Moves. Surprise Move triggered. Draw 1 Move.
context: 已连接 3 种不同招式，触发奇招，额外抽取 1 个招式

original_en: Connect 1 more Fist to make 4 Fists, triggering Combo Move. Draw 1 Move.
context: 再连接 1 个拳法达到 4 个拳法触发连招，额外再抽取 1 个招式

original_en: There are only 5 Fists on the field. Use DEF Move to copy Moves to next turn.
context: 此时场上只有 5 个拳法，利用守招可以复制招式到下个回合

original_en: Connect all the same Moves that can be connected
context: 继续连完可以连接的相同招式

original_en: You only connected 6 Moves this turn. But DEF Move gives you 1 more starting Move next turn.
context: 本回合最多只能连出了6个招式，但守招会让下回合初始招式多 1 招

original_en: Deliver Moves. You have 1 extra Move next turn.
context: 打出招式，下回合会额外多 1 个招式

original_en: Draw Chi from Inner Elixir Field
Follow the order required by the Inner Kungfu
context: 根据内功需求顺序依次连接

original_en: The Chi route must cover acupoints in the order required by the Inner Kungfu
context: 一条真气路线中要包含内功需要的穴位顺序

original_en: Connect back to the Inner Elixir Field to form a Chi circuit and activate Inner Kungfu
context: 最后连回丹田形成真气回路以激活内功

original_en: Changing the language will return you to the login screen. Proceed?
context: 切换语言会退出到登录场景，是否切换？
中了噬心蚀骨符被胁迫

original_en: Chosen Enter the command mode
context: 选择成员 进入命令模式

original_en: Close menu Exit command mode
context: 关闭菜单 退出命令模式

Choose Confirm Switch Return
context: 选择 确认 切换 返回

context: 移动镜头 旋转地块 放置地块 返回

context: 切换输入项 呼出键盘

context: 移动地图 选中地块

original_en: Mobile map Choose the land Chosen
context: 移动地图 选中地块 选择成员

context: 选取蓝图 + 移动镜头 + 缩放镜头 移动鼠标 确定

original_en: Select the blueprint slot Write
context: 选取蓝图槽位 写入
